bug.title: [Bug] The 'A' key on the keyboard cannot be used after the Flashing skill is over
bug.body: > After I used the Flashing, I cannot use the key 'A' on my keyboard, but 'W', 'S' and 'D' is still available. I reset the key 'A' in control and it works. But when i use the Flashing it happened again. I guess the reason is that the key is changed to a skill when I use the Flashing but it does not turn back when the skill is over. - OS: Windows 10 - MC Version and Forge version: 14.23.5.2854-1.12.2 - Version 1.1.3 (latest)

bug.title: [Invalid Resource] Crash on Tutorial
bug.body: When I right click the Misaka item, my game crashes and says "Shutting down internal server..." 1. Installed LambdaLib2 1.12.2 and AcademyCraft 1.12.2 2. Loaded with forge 3. In a new world, right clicked terminal 4. Crashes I assume the tutorial screen and GUI is supposed to open here but it just crashes ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/65203585/81627904-3382a480-93cd-11ea-85c8-fd4b520129fa.png) - Windows 10 - 1.12.2-forge1.12.2-14.23.5.2857 - AcademyCraft-Mod-1.12.2 - LambdaLib2-0.1.7 ---- Minecraft Crash Report ---- WARNING: coremods are present: llibrary (llibrary-core-1.0.11-1.12.2.jar) CorePlugin (LambdaLib2-0.1.7.jar) Do not report to Forge! (foamfix-0.10.10-1.12.2.jar) OpenModsCorePlugin (OpenModsLib-1.12.2-0.12.2.jar) Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge // I let you down. bug.title: [Bug]Config bug
bug.body: 於Skill.java中第203行的函式private float getOptionalFloat 其回傳值誤植為cfg.getDouble("damage_scale") 導致設定能力的其他數值時誤用damage_scale的數值 應該為cfg.getDouble(path) 最新的1.12.2及1.7.10版本皆有此bug

bug.title: [Bug] Bug Title Crash when opening the Misaka Cloud Terminal

bug.title: [Bug] 使用电击使磁场控制时闪退
bug.body: 我在提出 Issue 前搜寻到了类似的 #808 但是显然它没有得到正确的处理。 我将铁栅栏扔到了由[MmmMmmMmmMmm](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mmmmmmmmmmmm) 提供的不掉血人偶上。 通常情况下这个人偶被攻击后会显示此次攻击的伤害，而且前面的普通电击技能也能对该人偶正常释放。 我在正常普通的Forge服务器(Minecraft 1.12.2, 详细信息见下)执行了如上操作，之后所有人掉线，显示"服务器已关闭"，后台日志显示服务器崩溃。 并且再次启动服务器后，我复现了这一问题（x 以下是导出的全部`log`，包含了安装的模组等信息，可供参考。 <https://paste.ubuntu.com/p/j5Cc8sYWwm/> ``` ---- Minecraft Crash Report ---- // I let you down. Sorry :( Time: 2019-08-24 15:49:42 CST Description: Ticking entity java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot get property PropertyInteger{name=layers, clazz=class java.lang.Integer, values=[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8]} as it does not exist in BlockStateContainer{block=minecraft:air, properties=[]} at net.minecraft.block.state.BlockStateContainer$StateImplementation.getValue(BlockStateContainer.java:201) at net.minecraft.block.BlockSnow.isReplaceable(BlockSnow.java:159) at cn.academy.entity.EntityBlock$1.onEvent(EntityBlock.java:151) at cn.academy.entity.EntityBlock$1.onEvent(EntityBlock.java:135) at cn.lambdalib2.util.entityx.EntityX.postEvent(EntityX.java:121) at cn.lambdalib2.util.entityx.handlers.Rigidbody.onUpdate(Rigidbody.java:72) at cn.lambdalib2.util.entityx.EntityX.update(EntityX.java:53) at cn.lambdalib2.util.entityx.EntityAdvanced.onUpdate(EntityAdvanced.java:31) at cn.academy.entity.EntityBlock.onUpdate(EntityBlock.java:113) at cn.academy.entity.MagManipEntityBlock.onUpdate(MagManipEntityBlock.java:121) at net.minecraft.world.World.updateEntityWithOptionalForce(World.java:1993) at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.updateEntityWithOptionalForce(WorldServer.java:832) at net.minecraft.world.World.updateEntity(World.java:1955) at net.minecraft.world.World.redirect$updateEntity$zbd000(World.java:5118) at net.minecraft.world.World.updateEntities(World.java:1759) at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.updateTimeLightAndEntities(DedicatedServer.java:397) at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.tick(MinecraftServer.java:668) at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:526) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows: bug.title: [Bug]在服务器死亡后能力会被假重置，退出重进服务器才能恢复
bug.body: **Describe the bug** 在服务器死亡后能力会被假重置，退出重进服务器才能恢复 **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. 死亡 2. 能力回到初始状态 **Expected behavior** **Screenshots** ![2019-06-19_23 22 59](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49275165/59778772-ad0f3100-92e9-11e9-96bd-d3b14039df6a.png) ![2019-06-19_23 23 09](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49275165/59778774-ae405e00-92e9-11e9-9156-dc9dac668a28.png) ![2019-06-19_23 23 27](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49275165/59778778-aed8f480-92e9-11e9-934e-e44513ef52ed.png) **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [Windows10] - MC Version and Forge version: [14.23.5.2838-1.12.2] - Version [1.1.2] **Additional context**

Using VBOs: Yes Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'fml,forge,LiteLoader' Type: Client (map_client.txt) Resource Packs: Current Language: 简体中文 (中国) Profiler Position: N/A (disabled) CPU: 4x Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-5257U CPU @ 2.70GHz ```

bug.title: [Bug] Flashing's key binding is always WASD
bug.body: **Describe the bug** Flashing's key binding is always WASD, regardless of key binding **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Change 'Move Forward' to any key other than W 2. Use Flashing skill 3. Observe that flashing still uses 'W' to flash forward. **Expected behavior** I can use the new binded key to flash forward. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - Version 1.1.1

bug.title: [Bug] A bug about vecmanip
bug.body: **Describe the bug** when I used the "swing of the wind" which is a skill of vecmanip in the mod, and flew in the sky, pressing the key "A" to move toward left. After that I came back to the earth and I found I couldn't press the key "A" to move in the normal game without using the skill in the game. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. See error **Expected behavior** you can just move to left by pressing the key "A" in the game. **Screenshots** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. Windows, MacOS, Linux] - MC Version and Forge version: 1.12.2-forge1.12.2-14.23.5.2810 - Version 1.1.1 **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: [Bug] 传送使使用瞬间移动结束后无法向左移动
bug.body: 当我使用瞬间移动结束后，按A向左移动无效，必须打开按键把左移重新设置下A才行，具体原因未知

bug.title: 雷击之枪在攻击其他mod生成的怪物时会断开服务器
bug.body: 游戏版本1.12.2 Forge version 14.23.5.2815 后台无报错，在主世界一个区域内连续释放会概率性的断开 重连后此区域每次释放都会断开。 在服务器导入的地图内，使用这个技能攻击怪物后会断开服务器。 非常喜欢这个mod希望能解决这个问题 ![QQ截图20190413224624](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49587685/56081458-2436cd80-5e40-11e9-92e6-8d38ba7fa0ae.jpg)

bug.title: Strafe left stops working after using "Flashing" for teleporter
bug.body: Every time i use Flashing it unbinds strafe left which is by default "A" i can fix it by rebinding it but it always unbinds on use.

bug.title: [Bug] Config is regenerated every time
bug.body: **Describe the bug** You can't tweak the configs (for example disable ore generation) because every time you launch the game the config file is regenerated with the default values. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Change some Configs in academy.cfg 2. Start the Game 3. Check academy.cfg 4. See that all configs have the default value again **Expected behavior** save changed configs and don't reset them **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: Windows - MC Version and Forge version: 14.23.5.2835-1.12.2 - Version 1.1.1

bug.title: [Bug] 1.1.1 - Cannot be Downloaded via Twitch App
bug.body: Your latest version of AcademyCraft 1.1.1 as well as the update to LamdaLib causes twitch to be unable to download it wtih "Cannot find addon dependency 316472" This has been confirmed with only the 1.1.1 Update. As 1.1.0 downloads from the TwitchApp just fine.

bug.title: [Bug] Server/World Crashes on Launch
bug.body: **Describe the bug** I'm no good at deciphering crash reports, but it's almost certainly a compatibility thing. The server crashes every time I attempt to launch it, and when the world file was copied to singleplayer it crashed as well. It is in a relatively large modpack, but AcademyCraft was listed as the source so I'm posting it here. **To Reproduce** As I don't know the cause of the error, I don't know how to reproduce it. **Expected behavior** I would expect the server to hopefully not crash when launching a world. **Crash Logs** [crash-2019-04-05_11.47.58-server.txt](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/files/3048903/crash-2019-04-05_11.47.58-server.txt) [crash-2019-04-05_11.38.08-server.txt](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/files/3048905/crash-2019-04-05_11.38.08-server.txt) The first log is for client, the second is for the server. For some reason, the server's report's formatting is awful. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: Windows 10 - MC Version and Forge version: 14.23.5.2814-1.12.2 - Version 1.1.1 **Additional context** The server had been working fine since the mod's release and I've only just started having major issues.

bug.title: [Bug] Using Storm Wings unbinds A-strafe button
bug.body: After using Vector Manipulator Storm Wings A-strafe button unbinds. Nothing special in console. Academy Craft 1.1.1 Minecraft 1.12.2

bug.title: [Bug] Client Crash when using Thunderbolt on End Dragon
bug.body: Using Electromaster Thunder bolt on Ender Dragon causes Internal Server shutdown and application could become unresponsive. Console log: https://pastebin.com/SrMK4kaS Academy Craft 1.1.1 Minecraft 1.12.2

bug.title: [Bug] "Cannot find addon dependency 316472"
bug.body: When installing a modpack i made that included academycraft the install failed with the error "Cannot find addon dependency 316472" when academycraft was removed from the modpack install proceeded as normal without error. **Expected behavior** I expected the install to work - OS: windows 10 - MC Version and Forge version: 1.12.2 , forge-14.23.5.2815 - Version AcademyCraft 1.1.1

bug.title: [Bug] Thunderbolt causes Fatal Error
bug.body: **Describe the bug** Thunderbolt causes DC and then giving fatal error upon using thunderbolt on the mighty ender chicken and possibly other boss mobs. Naga from twilight forest does also give fatal error. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: Use thunderbolt on mighty ender chicken, i believe i experienced this issue with some other boss mobs before too but i can't remember right now which ones, i'll leave comment of which mobs if needed, then i will test various boss mobs. And naga from twilight forest also gives fatal error. **Expected behavior** To damage the enemy without DCing and getting error **Screenshots** None **Desktop (please complete the following information):** •OS: Windows 7 Ultimate •MC Version and Forge version: forge-14.23.5.2815 Minecraft 1.12.2 •Version AcademyCraft 1.1.1 **Additional context** Error log, i believe this is all that it gave me upon using thunder bolt https://pastebin.com/qL7a3Dhp

bug.title: [Bug] Server Crash upon using Vector Reflection against Guardians
bug.body: **Describe the bug** Endless loop of errors and server crash when using vector reflection against guardians or waiting them to attack you with their beam. It is possible this happens to anyone when using against someone with thorns, unsure though, i don't have my friend often playing in my server to test it out. Attack guardian with punch for example with vector reflection on when they have spikes grown. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: Use vector reflection against guardians **Expected behavior** Reflecting damage to guardian without endless error loop **Screenshots** Unable to explain/show with screenshot, see link at bottom for crash report **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: Windows 7 Ultimate - MC Version and Forge version: forge-14.23.5.2815 Minecraft 1.12.2 - Version AcademyCraft 1.1.1 **Additional context** Here is crash report link https://pastebin.com/svvBCdjz

bug.title: [Bug] Bug Title
bug.body: 当我超能力过载时，透明方块（包括菜单，背包，物品栏，草方块）都看不见了，只能重启客户端才能恢复，我试着退回到主界面，结果主界面显示的是我退出时看见的画面，所有按键都看不见

bug.title: [Bug] Incorrect and incompatible dependencies set in Curse Forge
bug.body: **Describe the bug** You have these two mods set as optional dependencies in the 1.12.2 build. They are not available on 1.12.2 [MineTweaker3](https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/minetweaker3) has migrated more then a year ago to [CraftTweaker](https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/crafttweaker). [Not Enough Items](https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/222211) doesn't even have a 1.12.2 port. It's been replaced entirely by [Just Enough Items](https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/jei). The closest you can get to NEI on 1.12.2, is JEI with an addon mod that adds NEI stuff to JEI. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/academycraft/files/2682190 2. Technically all you need is step one. But if you want proof, look at the mc versions that the aforementioned incompatible mods support **Expected behavior** A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Technically irrelevant. But I expected the mod author to correctly set it's (optional) dependencies. **Screenshots** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. Windows, MacOS, Linux] Irrelevant - MC Version and Forge version: [e.g. 14.23.4.2705-1.12.2] Irrelevant - Version [e.g. 1.1.0beta1] Semi irrelevant. It's the info set to 1.1.0 for mc 1.12.2 But the bug/error is explicitly in the file page for it, and **_not_** the mod its self. [Forge File ID 2682190](https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/academycraft/files/2682190) **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: [Bug][1.1.0] Crash when opening MisakaCloud tutorial
bug.body: **Describe the bug** In 1.1.0, some user will crash when opening **Tutorial App**. This crash has two causes: ## 1. Your game language isn't either `zh_cn` or `en_us` The mod failed to find the tutorial text file. We will fallback the tutorial text files to `en_us` in the next version. For now please use those two language to play the mod. ## 2. Your language is one of those two (FIXED) The crash is caused by an **error in build process** and is **already fixed** in the new jar in curseforge. Re-download the mod and it should have been fixed.

bug.title: [Bug] Shift-clicking an full stack of output out of a machine voids items if you have a partial stack in the first available slot
bug.body: **Describe the bug** When shift clicking outputs out of the metal former or imag fusor, if the first available slot has a large enough stack that the combined total of the inventory stack and the output stack exceeds 64, it will void any output in excess of 64, rather than making a new stack. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Process materials in any machine 2. have a partial stack in the first available slot in your inventory large enough that the processed materials will complete the stack, with extra to spare. 3. Shift-click the outputs out of the machine 4. Tested with the Metal Former and the Imag Fusor **Expected behavior** The items in excess of completing the first stack should start a new stack, not get voided. **Screenshots** Stack of 63 constraint metal plates in the first slot, 2 constraint metal plates in the Metal Former Output: ![2019-01-30_13 38 48](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11600141/52011198-8d8b7f00-2494-11e9-8f6b-446b833dc598.png) Shift clicking the 2 plates out of the Metal former, adds one to the stack in the inventory for a full 64, and voids the second: ![2019-01-30_13 38 58](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11600141/52011199-8d8b7f00-2494-11e9-9a6f-7068743065fc.png) **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: Windows 10 - MC Version and Forge version: 14.23.5.2808-1.12.2 - Version 1.1.0beta_5 - Tested in Singleplayer and in a LAN hosted on another machine. **Additional context** For instance, with 24 needles in on my hotbar, in slot 1, and 60 in the output of the metal former, shift-clicking the needles out voids 20, giving me a single stack of 64. Same thing happens for iron ingots as well. Having two partial stacks in your inventory, will still only fill one and void the excess. i.e. a stack of 24 and a stack of 1 in slots 1 and 2 of the hotbar, respectively, with 60 in the output, will void 20, giving a stack of 64, and leaving the stack of 1 alone. If the hotbar is full, it will prioritize the bottom-most row, going left to right. As a side note, it also will always shift click the items into the first available slot, even if there is a stack of that item already in your inventory. Might be related.

bug.title: [Bug] Ores Still Generate when Disabled
bug.body: In the config file, when the following is set: ``` # Whether the ores will be generated in overworld. [default: true] B:genOres=false ``` Ores still generate in the world.

bug.title: [Bug] Random strange crash when changing dimensions

bug.title: [Bug] Throwing a magnetic hook causes all nearby players to disconnect
bug.body: Upon throwing a magnetic hook with a right click, every player within viewing distance will get immediately disconnected, and then the hook will latch onto the intended surface.

bug.title: [Bug] App Installer - Skill Tree installs Frequency Transmitter instead
bug.body: When attempting to install the Skill Tree module into your data terminal it instead installs the Frequency Transmitter.

bug.title: [Bug] Scattering Bomb causes client crash

bug.title: [Bug] 单人游戏基础能力学习机第一次获得能力后游戏崩溃

bug.title: [Bug] Using Matrix in server causes crash
bug.body: **Describe the bug** Trying to right-click Matrix **immediately after placement** results in game crash for client side. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - 1.1.0beta3 dev **Additional context** ``` java.lang.NullPointerException: Unexpected error at cn.academy.block.block.BlockMatrix.onBlockActivated(BlockMatrix.java:59) at net.minecraft.client.multiplayer.PlayerControllerMP.processRightClickBlock(PlayerControllerMP.java:455) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.rightClickMouse(Minecraft.java:1692) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.processKeyBinds(Minecraft.java:2379) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.runTickKeyboard(Minecraft.java:2145) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.runTick(Minecraft.java:1933) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.runGameLoop(Minecraft.java:1186) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:441) at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(Main.java:118) at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62) at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498) at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:135) at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62) at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498) at net.minecraftforge.gradle.GradleStartCommon.launch(GradleStartCommon.java:97) at GradleStart.main(GradleStart.java:25) ```

bug.title: [Bug] 判定扇叶被阻挡的区域需向外扩展一格
bug.body: **Describe the bug** 目前是以主机前方的方块为中心，15乘15乘1的区域。 从截图可以看到此时扇叶末端是嵌入方块内的，但该方块不在判定区域内。 **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. See error **Expected behavior** A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. **Screenshots** ![2019-01-06_23 57 25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13258510/50738508-b9a63e00-120f-11e9-8388-00472fd630df.png) **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. Windows, MacOS, Linux] - MC Version and Forge version: [e.g. 14.23.4.2705-1.12.2] - Version [e.g. 1.1.0beta1] **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: [Bug] When the fan of Wind Generator is blocked, it will continue generating energy.
bug.body: **Describe the bug** When put a block in the area of the fan, it will disappear but the generator will continue generating energy. Also, GUI will not show that "the fan is blocked". **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. See error **Expected behavior** A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. **Screenshots** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. Windows, MacOS, Linux] - MC Version and Forge version: [e.g. 14.23.4.2705-1.12.2] - Version [e.g. 1.1.0beta1] **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: [Bug] Solar Generator will stop working when covered with water.
bug.body: **Describe the bug** Only when it's covered with water, it will stop working. While with other liquid covering, it will not stop., such as lava, imag flux liquid and uu matters. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. See error **Expected behavior** A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. **Screenshots** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. Windows, MacOS, Linux] - MC Version and Forge version: [e.g. 14.23.4.2705-1.12.2] - Version [e.g. 1.1.0beta1] **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: [Bug] Too many digits are shown in the Solar Generator
bug.body: **Describe the bug** Look at following screenshot At the generating speed. Just 0.6 IF/t is enough **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. bug.title: [Bug] Render error after opening Developer GUI
bug.body: 似乎打开开发机界面后 世界会暗淡... 且进入使用模式的状态时 铜导线出现一些异常 ![2019-01-06_17 49 32](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38691071/50734887-e2fba580-11e0-11e9-9b3a-62f9df35d2d5.png) 更多信息 - OS: Windows Server 2016 - CatServer version pro(free)-181231 (MC: 1.12.2) (Implementing API version 1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT, Forge version 14.23.5.2796) - 1.1.0beta2

bug.title: [Bug] Can't open UI for lots of machines in server
bug.body: 红圈内机械可打开，其余皆不可且右键交互会使背包物品顺序改变 图在下面 文： 可打开： 方块 能源桥 (IC2 EU输入) 能源桥 (IC2 EU输出) 基础能力开发机 物品： 便携能力开发机 御坂云终端 不可： 太阳能能量发生机 改良无线虚能节点 无线虚能矩阵 能力干涉方块 虚相位能量发生机 虚能融合机 金属处理机 风力能量发生器 - 主机 风力能量发生器 - 支架底座 高级无线虚能节点 高级能力开发机 更多信息 - OS: Windows Server 2016 - CatServer version pro(free)-181231 (MC: 1.12.2) (Implementing API version 1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT, Forge version 14.23.5.2796) - 1.1.0beta2

bug.title: [Bug] Problems of WorldGen
bug.body: **Describe the bug** Using World Stripper, I found that WorldGen has some problem. codes: AcademyCraft/src/main/java/cn/academy/worldgen/ACWorldGen.java For example, constraint_metal will generate between y = 60 and y = 24. But in the following screenshot, you can see the y = 24 line(using wool) and ores of constraint_metal below 24(also wool) Its size also has some problem. It's too small than what's in the code. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. See error **Expected behavior** A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. **Screenshots** ![2019-01-06_16 09 23](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13258510/50733705-7034ff00-11cd-11e9-917a-182e588f436c.png) **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. Windows, MacOS, Linux] - MC Version and Forge version: [e.g. 14.23.4.2705-1.12.2] - Version [e.g. 1.1.0beta1] **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: [Bug] Items will not show their info bar in the GUI of AC machines
bug.body: **Describe the bug** Just look at the screenshots below. First one is in AC machine, and the second is in IC2 machine **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. See error **Expected behavior** A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. **Screenshots** ![2019-01-06_15 54 44](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13258510/50733654-36172d80-11cc-11e9-88a8-3b6ee9d6ccc6.png) ![2019-01-06_15 54 59](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13258510/50733605-788c3a80-11cb-11e9-9f8f-efe9e1c837c7.png) **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: Windows - MC Version and Forge version: 2768 - Version 1.1.0_beta2 **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: [Bug][1.12.2] Jet Engine's effects aren't destroyed after skill end
bug.body: **Describe the bug** 使用突击喷射时，如果按下V取消技能，绿色位置指示光圈不会消失，重复上述操作会导致指示光圈重复产生 **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. 按住突击喷射技能按键 2. 按下 V 3.将会看到绿色指示光圈未消失 **Screenshots** ![2019-01-05_16 05 09](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26084381/50724796-16312c80-112e-11e9-935b-b6d31cf992fe.png) **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: Windows 10 - MC Version and Forge version: 1.12.2-14.23.5.2796 - Version 1.1.0_beta2

bug.title: [Bug] 1.1.0_beta2 在服务端上的问题
bug.body: 在服务器上使用时玩家点击各机械且背包物品会顺序会变化（身上装备也被物品替换，但是实际并没有） 服务端 CatServer 我是没看到报错 无法打开其UI 包括当不限于： 基础无线虚能节点 改良无线虚能节点 无线虚能矩阵 能力干涉方块 虚能融合机 金属处理机 高级无线虚能节点

bug.title: [Bug] Can't access UI for Solar Generator/Wind Generator
bug.body: When attempting to access the UI for a solar generator, it just corrupts the Client-Side display of their inventory, requiring a rejoin to fix.

bug.title: [Bug] 关于官服加forge形式服务器无法打开虚能节点UI面板
bug.body: **Describe the bug** 在服务器中安装mod后，对虚能节点进行右键会导致道具栏中的道具随机的移动到四个装备栏和人物自带的四格合成栏中，并且无法打开虚能节点的ui面板，但在客户端本地存档中不会出现这个问题。 **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. See error **Expected behavior** A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. **Screenshots** ![qq 20190102110436](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46307536/50579238-4ce11b80-0e7e-11e9-9f09-d8182228c3a3.png) ![qq 20190102110500](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46307536/50579239-4ce11b80-0e7e-11e9-97e3-1c7378030bd9.png) 以上两张图分别是羊毛与能力开发机背移动到头部装备位置的截图 **Desktop (please complete the following information):** MC服务器版本1.12.1 服务器forge版本14.23.5.2768 **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.title: [Bug]Some bugs associated with Magnet Manipulate
bug.body: **Describe the bug** BUG 1: After releasing the skill to sent the block, the block will drop visibly and then flash to the destination. It happens by chance, but very frequently. BUG 2: The block will reach wrong destination. It will have about 3-4 blocks of deviation compared with the place you want the block to stay. BUG 3: Sometimes the block wont stay at the block it reaches, but somewhere behind the blocks. The phenomenon is suspected to have the ability to supplant blocks. BUG 4: The skill cannot hurt enemies sometimes. Only enemies standing near the place where the block stay finally can be hurt, and sometimes no one will be hurt. Anyway, you cannot hurt the enemies on the track of the block. And when in low experience, the block will disappear sometimes. I'm not sure whether it's a bug. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '....' 3. Scroll down to '....' 4. See error **Expected behavior** A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. **Screenshots** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. Windows, MacOS, Linux] - MC Version and Forge version: [e.g. 14.23.4.2705-1.12.2] - Version [e.g. 1.1.0beta1] **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.

bug.body: Upon exiting the storm wing ability the "a" key (move left) will stop working. Rebinding the move left key to something else then back to "a" restores it's functionality

bug.title: [Bug] plasma_cannon disappear
bug.body: The use of skill in the flight of the projectile causes overload and the projectile will disappear. ![qq 20181223172306](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46082179/50382317-84f69a80-06d7-11e9-909d-b11ccbdb4cb0.png) ![qq 20181223172344](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46082179/50382318-84f69a80-06d7-11e9-9293-2bd666ea5e97.png) (Terrain destruction has been turned on)

[Bug] Touching creatures with reflection will have special effects

bug.title: [Bug] Magnet Manipulation drops items through the world
bug.body: When using Magnet Manipulation, the item you are grabbing and moving through the world very often just falls and gets deleted, I remember this being a problem from the previous version but its vastly more common now.

bug.title: 1.0.7版本AcademyCraft在1.7.10版本中的一个bug
bug.body: 游戏过程中，当我使用 旅行地图mod（journeymap-1.7.10-5.1.4p2-unlimited），使用导航点传送回到家里时，游戏出现了一些未知的问题，导致游戏退出，并提示出现了一些未知的错误。 经过几次粗略的检查加上日志报告，我发现应该是AcademyCraft的某个bug导致的。 通过几次测试，我发现，当打开AcademyCraft的超能力时，跨区块传送会导致退出世界（只是游戏内退出，客户端并没有崩溃）。 具体信息还请在附加的日志报告上查阅，谢谢您的检查。 如果有任何新的回复，请尽可能先联系2467458619@qq.com，麻烦了！ [1.txt](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/files/2297217/1.txt)

bug.title: [Bug] When destroyTerrain=false, some skills' exp won't grow
bug.body: 这会导致某些以之为前置要求的技能无法学习，从而影响游戏体验。典型例子如转移传送。 建议关闭地形破坏时，转移传送释放出方块后会以物品形式掉落，而不是直接放置方块。这样可以免于其被直接禁止使用。

bug.title: [Issue] Jet Engine flying through blocks
bug.body: If you angle your destination just before it touches the roof, and fly at it, you'll go right through. I made a video demonstrating this issue: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2lpNTiGnAT8 Thank you for continuing development, and I hope to see this issue fixed, at least in the post-1.7.10 versions.

bug.title: [1.0.6] Teleporter related ability bugs
bug.body: Forwarded from japanese forum ``` 初めまして、Minecraft Ver.1.7.10でAcademy Craftを楽しくプレイさせて頂いています。 プレイ中にバグを発見したので報告します。すでに他に同じ報告があったらすみません！ Version Minecraft 1.7.10 Academy Craft 1.0.6 内容 ・空間移動(teleporter)のマークテレポート(mark_teleport)のexpが100%のとき、マークテレポートのマーカーが消えずに残ります。 ・複数回使用するとマーカーが重なり、色が濃くなります。 とても気に入っているMODなのでバグ修正よろしくお願いします＼(^o^)／ ``` 1.06版本，空间移动能力在满经验值的时候，瞬移标记无法删除 如果连续使用瞬移标记，画面颜色会变浓

bug.title: [bug]能力会被重置
bug.body: 在服务器中，如果玩家连接超时的时候，会过很长一段时间才掉线或者意识到自己连接超时，如果在这一段时间内被杀死没有重生，能力就会被重置，包括数据终端也会重置

bug.title: [bug] 开启矢量反射后进入能力干涉方块的范围，不会打断矢量反射
bug.body: 如题。 而UI上确实出现了能力干涉方块应有的效果【图标变灰，CP条跳动等】。 测试环境AC1.0.4

bug.title: 有关电击使的体能强化的问题
bug.body: 电击使的体能强化进入overload状态后，周围的电场（第一人称）不会消失，然后如果再次使用会叠加这个画面效果。 最后效果叠加会使得玩家变成了"瞎子"，而且这个问题必须要重启游戏才能够解决。

bug.title: [Bug?] Teleporter AC v1.0.6
bug.body: I think the teleporting blue? image is not disappear when teleported, even I disabled the ability.

bug.title: [1.0.5] Teleporter can use only in minecart.
bug.body: As title.

bug.title: [bug]原子崩坏的光盾攻击无敌的NPC时会提升熟练度，但是NPC不会受到伤害
bug.body: 初步考虑修复方案为“在判断光盾有效杀伤之后提升熟练度”。

bug.title: [bug]当坐在诸如车、船、马上之时，传送使的大部分技能会失去效果
bug.body: 已知包括标记传送、穿透传送、坐标传送、高速闪现在内的大部分位移技能全部无效，但是CP会被扣除。具体表现为传送出去一瞬间就被拉回载具上。

bug.title: [1.0.4] Cannot use Meltdowner level 2 abilities
bug.body: Hello, I play on a server with Academycraft 1.0.4 installed. It is a lot of fun! But, as a Meltdowner, I can only use Electron Bomb. I have learned both Scatter Bomb and Light Shield, but I cannot cast them. It instantly overloads me, and nothing happens. I am already 80% towards Meltdowner 3, only from using Electron Bomb. I am the only Meltdowner on the server so far. Everyone else has other classes, and they do not have any problems. I found something like this described in #274, but that was may months ago, in an older version. Is that an old bug that has reappeared? I apologize if this bug has already been reported. I cannot read the Chinese entries.

bug.title: [1.0.4]将数据终端放到展示框中将产生异常效果
bug.body: 笔者无法上传图片，详细情况请在MC中实现。

bug.title: [1.0.4]矢量反射的特效在退出游戏后不会消失
bug.body: 当开启矢量反射后，退出世界而不关闭游戏，进入任意世界，矢量反射的波纹仍然会存在。 注：可能涉及底层。

bug.title: [1.0.4] 多人模式下磁场控制EntityBlock不生成
bug.body: 关于“在服务端中磁场控制技能”的BUG反馈如下： ![1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/21095880/18224197/7a5c8d28-7200-11e6-9bbf-ec14e44a7176.png) ![2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/21095880/18224202/7f1809e6-7200-11e6-8655-e873aaada3d3.png) ![3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/21095880/18224203/83009988-7200-11e6-844a-70a96daf02f7.png) *只有在服务器下才会有此BUG，已经测试更多的服务器，都有这种情况。 *望修复。

bug.title: [1.0.4] Vector Deviation crashes the game
bug.body: Basically that. http://pastebin.com/eFa4DBrH - The crashlog http://pastebin.com/eFa4DBrH - The modpack Forge 10.13.4.1614 AcademyCraft 1.0.4

bug.title: [1.0.4] 矢量反射技能特效没有正常终止
bug.body: 开矢量反射将cp耗尽，刚恢复时再开再次耗尽cp后会永久有开启反射的游戏显示（就是屏幕上一个一个的黑圈）但是不会真正反射伤害，和没开一样

bug.title: [1.0.4] Shift Teleport consumes two items per use
bug.body: Per activation, 2 items are consumed from stack in hand, but 1 is placed. Not sure if intended or not. Currently using on server.

bug.title: [1.0.4] Data Terminal not working in Dimensions greater then 127
bug.body: When you are in a Dimension with an id greater then 127 (and supposedly smaller then -127, but i didn't have a dimension to test) you are unable to open the terminal. ("You have not yet installed Data Terminal.") If you are trying to install the Terminal again, it doesn't allow installation ("You have already installed Data Terminal.")

bug.title: [1.0.4] 能源桥一段时间后会中断从节点处取电
bug.body: mod中的无线能源系统，在我配置的IC2，BC环境中有一定几率出现能量无法从节点输送到能源桥的情况，而且有重复出现的迹象，不是偶然的错误，亲测大概4个小时出现2-3次。一般发生在我长时间打开游戏的情况下，具体情况表现为节点中能量满，但是与能源桥相连的IC2机器或者BC炼油厂无法获得对应的能量输入，退回首届面再进入该世界可以解决这个问题。

bug.title: [1.0.4] 转移传送会一次消耗2个方块
bug.body: 这个转移传送是使用一次消耗两格方块么？奇怪的是我使用到最后2格物品的时候可以使用两次，如下图： 1图中拿出了一组圆石，二图开始使用技能，三图技能使用完毕，可见使用了两块原石，四图分出了2块单独的圆石，五图使用技能，六图可见两块原石使用了两次，加起来消耗了4块原石但是只出现3块方块 ![2016-08-23_09 44 16](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17877509/67c78a0c-6916-11e6-9b5a-2a566479e063.png) ![2016-08-23_09 44 20](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17877510/67ea9fe2-6916-11e6-9963-36c6b92903b9.png) ![2016-08-23_09 44 24](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17877506/658ad4ec-6916-11e6-9bb1-7116dc738d0c.png) ![2016-08-23_09 44 35](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17877505/657c255a-6916-11e6-8237-740da3a24b38.png) ![2016-08-23_09 44 43](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17877507/6639761e-6916-11e6-86a9-33b00508917b.png) ![2016-08-23_09 44 58](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17877508/663a2834-6916-11e6-8ee2-3fd0866a2c88.png) ~~另外，mod中的无线能源系统，在我配置的IC2，BC环境中有一定几率出现能量无法从节点输送到能源桥的情况，而且有重复出现的迹象，不是偶然的错误，亲测大概4个小时出现2-3次。一般发生在我长时间打开游戏的情况下，具体情况表现为节点中能量满，但是与能源桥相连的IC2机器或者BC炼油厂无法获得对应的能量输入，退回首届面再进入该世界可以解决这个问题~~

bug.title: [1.0.4] 服务器使用光盾会直接导致过载
[1.0.4] 金属处理机会自动切换模式，即使是在机器里面有材料的情况下
[1.0.4] 退出游戏重进后各个能源节点的连接会断开
[1.0.4] 坐标传送崩溃

bug.title: [1.0.4] 生物电强化的HUD有几率永久不消失
bug.body: 关于"电击使"的"生物电强化"技能BUG反馈 当使用"生物电强化"技能时,概率出现生物电强化的GUI永久不消失,但当重启客户端后消失 如图所示:https://i.gyazo.com/90c4aa9bd3d33d8d7d212b179815498d.png 当关闭超能力还是保持着生物电强化的GUI

经过测试 AcademyCraft 1.0.1 LambdaLib 1.2.0 无AcademyBukkit 1.0.0 可以正常连接服务器 望尽快解决

bug.title: [1.0.4]虚能融合机虚相位液体容量显示错误
bug.body: Ex. 一次操作中放入了5000mm的虚相位液体，在成功获得中纯度水晶后还剩2000mm，然而关闭游戏后再打开，可以看到里面不含任何的液体（也就是2000mm的虚相位液体消失），事实上液体仍然存在，只需要丢入一个液体单元和一块低纯度水晶后机器仍可以完成生产中纯度水晶的工作，同时也会正常显示液体容量 另外，经过第二次尝试，发现只要回到标题界面后液体显示就会错误，同时无论之前经过什么操作，即使仅仅是放入了液体，回到标题界面之后液体就会消失。 如图： ![2016-08-16_10 37 09](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17686310/153b8c84-639e-11e6-870a-d1f9700fcc20.png) ![2016-08-16_10 37 23](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17686311/15a823c6-639e-11e6-91ab-553de56fbe90.png) ![2016-08-16_10 37 36](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17686314/1861b56e-639e-11e6-8778-442a15db6cb6.png) ![2016-08-16_10 37 40](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17686313/16be0456-639e-11e6-885d-ca8d5b18088d.png)
