/api.github.com/users/KSkun/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/octet-stream","state":"uploaded","size":28803852,"download_count":1029,"created_at":"2016-08-06T09:48:14Z","updated_at":"2016-08-06T09:50:20Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.4/AcademyCraft-1.0.4.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.4","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.4","body":"English\r\n=====\r\n\r\nAcademyCraft1.0.4bringsaboutsomeenhancementsandbugfixes.Theskillsofelectromasterarerewritteninscalaandimprovedforusing.\r\n\r\n##Feature\r\n\r\n*Whichworldsareabletodestroyblocksareconfigurablewhenyoudisabledblockdestroying\r\n*NowVectorManipulationcategoryhasitsownachievements\r\n\r\n##Enhancement\r\n\r\n*Correctsometyposinconfigfile\r\n*RewriteElectroMastercategoryinscalalanguageanduseContext,abetterutiltoprocessnetworkcommunication\r\n\r\n##Bugfixes\r\n\r\n*Fixedpaintingsanditemframesdamagedwhendisabledblockdestroying\r\n*FixedVecReflection/Deviationcan'treflectEntitySmallFireballorEntityLargeFireball\r\n*FixedVecReflection/DeviationreflectsExperienceOrbs\r\n*FixedDataTerminalappcountalways0\r\n*FixedskilleffectsofElectroMasterisinvisiblewhenplayingMP\r\n\r\n简体中文\r\n=====\r\n\r\nAcademyCraft1.0.4带来了一些细节改进和bug修复。电击使能力的技能使用scala语言重写并且根据使用改进了。\r\n\r\n##新特性\r\n\r\n*当你禁止破坏方块的时候，你可以指定哪些世界是允许破坏方块的（设置例外）了\r\n*矢量操作能力现在也有成就了\r\n\r\n##改进\r\n\r\n*校正了配置文件中的一些语言错误\r\n*用scala语言重写了电击使的技能，并且使用了Context（更好的处理网络通信的工具）\r\n\r\n##Bug修复\r\n\r\n*修复了禁止破坏方块时图画和物品框会被破坏\r\n*修复了矢量反射/偏移技能不能影响火球和大火球\r\n*修复了矢量反射/偏移技能会反射经验球\r\n*修复了数据终端的App数总为0\r\n*修复了电击使技能特效在多人游戏中不可见"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3720018","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3720018/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3720018/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.3","id":3720018,"tag_name":"1.0.3","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.3","draft":false,"author":{"login":"KSkun","id":5047602,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/5047602?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun","html_url":"https://github.com/KSkun","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-07-22T15:46:38Z","published_at":"2016-07-22T16:27:55Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/2032592","id":2032592,"name":"AcademyCraft-1.0.3.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"KSkun","id":5047602,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/5047602?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun","html_url":"https://github.com/KSkun","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/octet-stream","state":"uploaded","size":28762527,"download_count":10,"created_at":"2016-07-22T16:25:31Z","updated_at":"2016-07-22T16:27:43Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.3/AcademyCraft-1.0.3.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.3","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.3","body":"English\r\n=====\r\n\r\nAcademyCraft1.0.3bringsaboutlotsofenhancementsandbugfixes.TheVecDeviation/Reflectionskillsarerewrittentoimproveuseexperience.\r\n\r\n##Feature\r\n\r\n*MatterunitcannowputImagPhaseLiquidintoworld\r\n*Setofmetallicblocks&entitiesisnowconfigurable\r\n*DataTerminal'sUInowshowscurrenttime\r\n\r\n##Enhancement\r\n\r\n*ImplementedhopperpullingbehaviourforMetalFormer&ImagFusor\r\n*ImprovementsforVecDeviation/Reflection\r\n-Changedtextureofwaveeffect\r\n-Changetoswitchon-offstyleofcontrolling\r\n-Makelistofaffectedentitiesconfigurable\r\n-CancelknockbackifabsorbedalldamageforReflection\r\n-FixednoexpincreaseforReflection\r\n-Addedscreen-spaceeffecct\r\n\r\n##Bugfixes\r\n\r\n*FixedlogoinMisakaCloudnotshowingcompletely\r\n*FixedNEIrecipesupportdisplayforMetalFormer&ImagFusor\r\n*Fixedsometypoindataconfigfile\r\n*FixedexperiencecalculationforMagnetMovementandDimensionFoldingTheoremskills\r\n*FixedElectronBomb'seffectnotdisplaying\r\n*FixedteleportationofsurroundingentitiesforLocationTeleport\r\n*FixedsomepotentialissuesaboutCP/Overloadconsumption\r\n\r\n简体中文\r\n=====\r\n\r\nAcademyCraft1.0.3带来了大量的细节改进和bug修复。矢量操作的矢量反射/偏移技能进行了大幅改进。\r\n\r\n##新特性\r\n\r\n*物质单元现在可以将虚相液体放置到世界中\r\n*添加了自定义金属方块&实体的选项\r\n*数据终端的UI现在会显示当前时间\r\n\r\n##改进\r\n\r\n*实现了金属处理机和虚能融合机的漏斗搬运行为\r\n*对矢量偏移/矢量反射技能的改进\r\n-修改了波动特效贴图的风格\r\n-将技能操作方式改为开关（而非长按）\r\n-现在可以自定义影响哪些实体了\r\n-如果反射技能吸收了所有的伤害，取消对使用者的击退\r\n-修复了反射技能的经验不增加\r\n\r\n##Bug修复\r\n\r\n*修复了御坂云终端的logo显示不完全\r\n*修复了金属处理机和虚能融合机的NEI合成表支持\r\n*修复了数据配置文件中的一些错字\r\n*修复了磁场牵引和空间折叠理论技能的经验值计算\r\n*修复了原子崩坏第一个技能的特效不显示\r\n*修复了定位传送对于使用者周边玩家的传送\r\n*修复了和CP/过载消耗的一些潜在问题"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3595123","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3595123/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3595123/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.2","id":3595123,"tag_name":"1.0.2","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.2","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-07-06T06:30:50Z","published_at":"2016-07-06T07:09:55Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1948073","id":1948073,"name":"AcademyCraft-1.0.2.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":28677423,"download_count":4128,"created_at":"2016-07-06T06:44:14Z","updated_at":"2016-07-06T07:09:07Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.2/AcademyCraft-1.0.2.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.2","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.2","body":"English\r\n=====\r\n\r\nAcademyCraft1.0.2bringsaboutausefulnewfeature:**Abilitydatacustomization**.Thedataoflevelupgradingisadjustedtoreducegrinding.Alsothereareseveralrewrites,bugfixesandenhancements.\r\n\r\n##Features\r\n\r\n*Implementedfullabilitydatacustomization.Finditin`config/academy-craft-data.conf`afterstartingthegameonce.\r\n*AddoptiontodisableMisakaCloudTerminal'sautoacquire(#345).\r\n\r\n##Enhancements\r\n\r\n*Updatedzh_TWlang.\r\n*Rewrite**LocationTeleport**skill.\r\n*Rewritelevelprogresscalculationlogic.ItisnowbasedonskillexperenceincrementratherthanCPusage.\r\n*Improvedfontrenderinginlowerresolutions.\r\n*Rewritemediaplayer,fixsomesubtlebugs.(AlsoadjustedUIalittle)\r\n*Somecodeoptimization.Improvegameloadingspeed&networkperformance.\r\n*AddedlocalizationforSkillTreeconsoletexts.\r\n*Increasethespeedofabilitydevelopement.\r\n\r\n##Bugfixes\r\n\r\n*Fixbreakingcontainerblocksdoesn'tcloserelevantUI(#299).\r\n*Fixsomeunintendedfailurewhenresettingability.\r\n\r\n简体中文\r\n=====\r\n\r\nAcademyCraft1.0.2带来了一个非常有用的功能：**技能数据自定义**；等级升级的数据经过调整，以减少游戏过程中的重复性；除此之外，还有一些代码重写、bug修复和功能改进。\r\n\r\n##新特性\r\n\r\n*实现了能力数据自定义。在启动游戏一次后，在`config/academy-craft-data.conf`可以找到设置文件。\r\n*添加了关闭自动给予御坂云终端的设置(#345)。\r\n\r\n##功能改进\r\n\r\n*更新了zh_TWlang。\r\n*重制了定位传送技能。\r\n*重写了玩家能力等级提升的机制：它现在基于技能熟练度的上升。\r\n*改进了低分辨率下的字体渲染。\r\n*重写了媒体播放器，修复了一些微妙的bug（同时轻微调整了UI）\r\n*一些代码优化，提高整体的计算&网络性能。\r\n*为能力开发机的控制台文字添加了本地化。\r\n*提高了开发机进行开发的速度。\r\n\r\n##Bug修复\r\n\r\n*修复了破坏方块不使打开的UI关闭(#299).\r\n*修复了能力重置时一些意料之外的失败。\r\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3227657","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3227657/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3227657/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.1","id":3227657,"tag_name":"1.0.1","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.1","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-05-14T17:44:55Z","published_at":"2016-05-15T02:56:31Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1686088","id":1686088,"name":"AcademyCraft-1.0.1.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":28552832,"download_count":13,"created_at":"2016-05-15T02:52:19Z","updated_at":"2016-05-15T02:56:06Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.1/AcademyCraft-1.0.1.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.1","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.1","body":"en_US\r\n=====\r\n\r\nSeveralenhancements&bugfixes.\r\n\r\n##Enhancements\r\n\r\n*AddGUIforenergybridges(#325)\r\n*Updateja_JP.langtonewestcontent\r\n*ImproveddescofStormWingtotellthatitbreaksblocks\r\n\r\n##Bugfixes\r\n\r\n*FixBasic&LuckMiningraycrash.(#327)\r\n*FixMetalFormerdoesn'tsaveinventory(#324)\r\n*FixMetalFormercan'tcyclemodeproperlywithsomemodsinstalled(#321)\r\n*FixMetalFormer'smodecycledirection(#331)\r\n*FixMetalFormerandImagFusorsoundstillplayingwhenbroken\r\n*FixTeleportercriticalhitcrashesgame\r\n*FixopeningWindGenBaseUIdoesn'tblockfurtheraction(#316)\r\n*FixclickingonsomestacksinUIswillcausethemtobedroppedoutimmediately\r\n*Fixwirelessuserslostconnectiononworldreload\r\n*Fixphaseliquiddoesn'tgenerateinotherworlds(e.g.Multiworldplugins)\r\n\r\nzh_CN\r\n=====\r\n\r\n一些改进和bug修复。\r\n\r\n##功能改进\r\n\r\n*为能源桥添加了GUI(#325)\r\n*更新ja_JP.lang\r\n*改进了风翼技能的说明，以指出它会破坏周围的方块\r\n\r\n##Bug修复\r\n\r\n*修复了基础&时运采集光束崩溃(#327)\r\n*修复了金属合成机不保存物品栏(#324)\r\n*修复了金属合成机在与某些mod同时安装时无法切换模式(#321)\r\n*修复了金属合成机UI中切换模式按钮的方向(#331)\r\n*修复了机器方块在被破坏后音效仍在播放\r\n*修复了空间使的暴击使游戏崩溃\r\n*修复了在打开风力发电基座后，还能继续打开物品UI(#316)\r\n*修复了点击UI中的某些物品会让它们立刻被丢出\r\n*修复了在世界重新加载时无线连接信息丢失\r\n*修复了虚相位液体在其他主世界不生成(e.g.多世界插件生成的主世界)\r\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3177811","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3177811/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3177811/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.0","id":3177811,"tag_name":"1.0.0","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.0","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-05-07T14:00:00Z","published_at":"2016-05-07T14:55:06Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1652940","id":1652940,"name":"AcademyCraft-1.0.0.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":28551391,"download_count":259,"created_at":"2016-05-07T14:45:17Z","updated_at":"2016-05-07T14:46:32Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.0/AcademyCraft-1.0.0.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.0","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.0","body":"![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/master/blob/logo.png)\r\n\r\nEnglish\r\n=====\r\n\r\nFirstformalversionofAcademyCraft.Havefun!\r\n\r\nRequiredforgeversion:1.7.10-10.13.4.1517orhigher\r\n\r\nDependency:[LambdaLib1.2.0](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.2.0)\r\n\r\n##Features\r\n\r\n*Anewly-forgedabilitycategory:VectorManipulation!\r\n*MediaPlayerApp:Addedvolumeedit&trackcustomization\r\n*AcompleteUIreworkonallblocks,featuringamorecoolanduniforminterface\r\n*AddedAbilityInductionFactor:Andungeon-generateditemthatallowsonetochangecategory\r\n\r\n##Enhancements\r\n\r\n###Major\r\n\r\n*Completelyrewritenetworksynchronizationlogiconmanyplaces,improvenetworkperformance.\r\n*Providebetterdescriptionofwhatperksdo\r\n*Loweredlevelrequirementofperk'MindCourse'and'AdvancedMindCourse'.\r\n*ImprovedusagepermissionforMatrixandNode:Onlyplacerscanrename/changepasswordfornow.\r\n*Addedoptionalpasswordvalidationfornodes.\r\n*AddskillusingstatusdisplayforKeyHintUI:Itwillgiveyouhintwhentoreleaseaskillnow.\r\n*AddUIforSolarGenerator.\r\n*ChangethewayofrecordingCooldowntoavoidsomeproblems.\r\n*Addic2supporttoCurrentChargingofElectromaster.\r\n*Rewritethetutorial,renametoMisakaCloudTerminal.\r\n*ImproveMagnetManipulationofElectromaster,nowithassoundeffect.\r\n\r\n###Minor\r\n\r\n*HoldingVwillcauseCPBartodisplaynumericalCPandOverloaddata.\r\n*Addedspecialplayerkillchattextforskills\r\n*Using`/aim`commandinCreativeModedoesn'tforceyoutoset`/aimcheats_on`anymore\r\n*Oreswillnowspawninoverworldsofmulti-worldpluginsnormally.\r\n*Addreturntheresultofusingcoin.(openthisfeatureinDataTerminal)\r\n*Changethewaytocalculateoverload.\r\n*CPbarnowfadeswhenoverloadtoindicateabilityunavailable.\r\n*Add**FontCustomize**,finditincfgfile.\r\n*StopBGMwhenopenMediaPlayer.\r\n*Addexplanationaboutrequiredleveltolearnskills.\r\n*NowtheCPrecoverrateistripled.\r\n*ImprovedappearanceofImagPhaseGenerator.\r\n*UpdatethetextureofPortableDeveloper.\r\n\r\n##Bugfixes\r\n\r\n*Fixperksautomaticallylearnedwhenusingskills,andperkspotentiallynotworking.\r\n*FixAbilityDeveloperblockcausingmemoryoverflowinserverenvironment.\r\n*FixMetalFormer'smodebeingresetonworld/chunkreload(#261,#291)\r\n*Fixcoindoublingafterthrow(#255)\r\n*Fixcrystaloresdon'tsupportFortuneEnhancement(#263)\r\n*FixFlashingskillcausingdanglingghostsinworld(#285)\r\n*FixcrashmadebyMediaPlayer.\r\n*FixUIdisappearanceproblemcausedbyNEI.\r\n*FixlogicerrorwhencloseFrequencyTransmitter.(#270)\r\n*FixcrashcausedbyThermalFoundation.(#294)\r\n*Fixproblemswhenshift-clickingslots.\r\n*Fixabnormalenergyconversionrate.\r\n*FixproblemswithFlashing.\r\n*FixcannotaddwhitelistintoAbilityInterferencer\r\n*Fixanimeofnodeconnection.\r\n*Fixproblemswithoverload.Nowthesystemwillabsorttheskillwhenoverload.\r\n*Fixwirelessmachinecannnotconnecttonodewithpassword.\r\n*Fixcannotperformsomeskills.\r\n*Fixskillkeydeadlockwhentheplayerreborn.\r\n*FixcrashcausedbyLocationTeleport.\r\n*Fixsomeskillstillactiveafterreleasekey.\r\n*Fixsomeskillsdestroyblocksevenwhentheoptionisturnedoff.\r\n*FixabnormalvisuallengthofRayBarrage.\r\n*Fixmostservercrashcausedbyskills.\r\n*FixdamagecausedbyMagnetMovement.\r\n*FixCurrentChargingdoesn'tstopafterCPbarisempty.\r\n*FixDataTerminalGUIdoesn'tupdateafterinstallingApp.\r\n*FixcrashwhenrunningwithShadersmod.\r\n*Improvedtickingalgorithmofwirelessnetwork.\r\n*FixwrongconnectionamongNodesandMatrix.\r\n*FixwrongvisualeffectofMatrixandWindGenerator.\r\n*Fixcrashwhentrytogetitemsfromfusor.\r\n*FixwrongenergyconsuminginImagPhaseGenerator.\r\n*Fixsmallproblemaboutmemoryleaks.\r\n*Fixnodecannotdisplaynetworksituationcorrectly.\r\n*FixRFsupport.\r\n*Fixlotsofproblemscausedbycooldownsystem.(#310)\r\n*FixMeltdownercan'tbeusedinserver.(#309)\r\n\r\n简体中文\r\n=====\r\n\r\n这是AcademyCraft的第一个正式版本。祝游戏愉快！\r\n\r\n要求的Forge版本:1.7.10-10.13.4.1517或更高\r\n\r\nDependency:[LambdaLib1.2.0](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.2.0)\r\n\r\n##特性添加\r\n\r\n*新能力系：矢量操作！\r\n*媒体播放器App：添加音量编辑和自定义音轨功能\r\n*对机器方块部分的完全UI重置，带来更加酷炫和易用的界面\r\n*添加了能力诱导因子：一个地牢生成的物品，允许玩家在获得能力后更换能力系。\r\n\r\n##功能改进\r\n\r\n###主要\r\n\r\n*重写了大部分的网络同步逻辑，提高了网络性能。\r\n*为被动能力的效果提供了更好的说明。\r\n*降低了“大脑训练课程”和“高级大脑训练课程”的学习等级需求。\r\n*改进了矩阵和节点的使用权限：现在只有放置者可以更改其名称和密码。\r\n*为无线节点添加了可选的密码验证。\r\n*在键位提示UI处添加了技能状态指示：你可以通过图标的状态查看技能的蓄力/释放情况。\r\n*现在CD会在服务端计算。修正了重进服务器CD重置等一系列的问题。\r\n\r\n###次要\r\n\r\n*长按技能激活键会让CP指示条显示CP和过载的数值。\r\n*添加了技能的击杀提示。\r\n*在创造模式使用`/aim`技能不会再强制要求你开启`/aimcheats_on`了。\r\n*在多世界插件的情况下，应该也可以正常生成矿物了。\r\n*抛硬币现在可以返回硬币结果。（在数据终端设置里开启）\r\n*调整了过载的计算逻辑。\r\n*CP条在过载回复时颜色会减淡，以提示玩家无法使用。\r\n*添加了**字体自定义**功能。可以在cfg中找到相关选项。\r\n*添加了所有GUI的本地化文字。\r\n*媒体播放器开始播放时，会停止MC的背景音乐。\r\n*开发机和技能树app的图片显示会加以区分。\r\n*改进了玩家能力经验条的显示，并且添加了文字说明。\r\n*添加了技能的需求等级说明。\r\n*CP回复速度提高为原来的3倍。\r\n*稍稍调整了虚相发电机的外观。\r\n*更新了便携开发机的材质以同步最新UI。\r\n\r\n##Bug修复\r\n\r\n*修复了被动能力自动被学习，以及无效的情况\r\n*修复了能力开发机在多人环境下导致内存溢出\r\n*修复了金属处理机在世界/区块重新加载时模式被重置(#261,#291)\r\n*修复了硬币在丢出后无法和原来的堆叠(#255)\r\n*修复了某些矿物不支持时运附魔(#263)\r\n*修复了高速闪现技能使用后留下人影(#285)\r\n*修复媒体播放器在游戏环境崩溃\r\n*修复NEI挡住UI部分区域\r\n*添加电气使系名中文lang\r\n*修复频率变送器的退出的逻辑错误（#270）\r\n*修复和ThermalFoundation一起安装时崩溃（#294）\r\n*修复了和Shift点击槽位判断相关的一系列问题\r\n*修复了能源传输速率高于标称值的问题\r\n*修复了高速闪现技能的一系列错误，包括一直没成功修复的人影问题\r\n*修复了能力干涉方块无法添加玩家\r\n*修复了节点连接状态的动画\r\n*修复了技能过载时的一系列触发机制。在过载时会结束蓄力技能和特殊技能\r\n*修复了无线用电器无法连接到加密的节点\r\n*修复了电磁炮等技能无法释放的问题\r\n*修复了玩家死亡后重生，技能按键仍然未被释放\r\n*修复了坐标传送导致崩溃\r\n*修复了部分技能在松开按键后仍然继续运行（显示cp消耗提示）\r\n*修复了冷却相关的一些问题\r\n*修复了在技能树UI中，没学习技能时也会提示输入learn指令\r\n*修复了某些技能不受destroyBlocks选项的影响\r\n*修复了原子崩坏系散射光束雨技能当没打到半导体时光束长度计算不正确\r\n*修复了绝大部分技能适用造成服务端崩溃的问题\r\n*修复了磁场移动带来奇怪的掉落伤害\r\n*修复电流回充在CP消耗完毕后不停止\r\n*修复了在打开数据终端时安装app，数据终端页面不会更新\r\n*修复了和光影同时打开的崩溃\r\n*调整了无线网的算法，修复了破坏方块后连接信息扔驻留的问题\r\n*搜索无线网时，不会显示无法连接到的节点/矩阵\r\n*提高了一些方块的同步距离，解决了矩阵金属板不显示和风力风扇不显示的问题\r\n*修复了磁场操作自杀和崩溃\r\n*修复了从熔炉拿出来一些mod内物品时崩溃\r\n*修复了虚相发电机空转（不工作但消耗能量）\r\n*修复了一些小的内存泄露问题\r\n*修复了节点方块没有正确的显示网络状态\r\n*修复了一些特效的显示细节\r\n*修复了电流回充技能对RF能源方块的支持\r\n*修复了冷却系统相关的许多问题。(#310)\r\n*修复了矢量操控在混淆环境中不正常工作的问题。(#311)\r\n*修复了服务端无法使用原子崩坏。(#309)\r\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2516238","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2516238/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2516238/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0pr3_1","id":2516238,"tag_name":"1.0pr3_1","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0pr3_1","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-01-29T13:28:52Z","published_at":"2016-01-30T05:15:10Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1259925","id":1259925,"name":"AcademyCraft-1.0pr3_1.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":27131188,"download_count":21,"created_at":"2016-01-30T04:40:23Z","updated_at":"2016-01-30T05:08:20Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0pr3_1/AcademyCraft-1.0pr3_1.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0pr3_1","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0pr3_1","body":"en_US\r\n-----\r\n[section]:#(en_USBEGIN)\r\n\r\n#Briefing\r\n\r\nLotsofbugfixesandsomeminorenhancements.\r\n\r\nServerisnowplayableandshouldcausenoserioustroubles.\r\n\r\nRecommendedForgeversion:1.7.10-10.13.4.1517orhigher\r\n\r\nDependency:[LambdaLib1.1.1](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.1.1)\r\n\r\n#Changelog\r\n\r\n##Feature\r\n\r\n*Addversionupdatenotification\r\n*AddHUDUIpositioncustomization,accessiblefromSettingsApp\r\n\r\n##Enhancement\r\n\r\n*Lotsofcodecleanup\r\n*RewrittenpartofabilityAPI\r\n*TheFlashingskillnowcanbeactivatedwithotherskillsstillusable\r\n*AddedsmeltingrecipedisplayforResearchNote\r\n*ResearchNote'snewitemactivationnowtriggersanUInotification\r\n*UpdatedallfontrenderingtousingTrueType\r\n*AddedMetalFormerrecipetodoubletheimagcrystalfromore\r\n*Makeshadercompilationfailgracefully,machinesthatdoesn'tsupportshadercanalsorunthemod\r\n\r\n##Bugfix\r\n\r\n*Fixoutrightcrashinserver(#231)\r\n*Fixresonantcrystalore'smetalformerrecipe(#238)\r\n*FixBlockDevelopercrashingwithNEI(#237)\r\n*FixoutrightcrashwhenLambdaLibisnotinstalled(#231)\r\n*Fixwindgeneratorwirelessiconposition(#228)\r\n*FixsomeblockcanplaceandopenGUIatoneright-click(#202)\r\n*FixabunchoferrorrelatedtoPlayerDatanullpointer(#230,#232,#239)\r\n*Fixbraincourseskillnotimprovingwhenskillexpisfull(#214)\r\n\r\n[section]:#(en_USEND)\r\n\r\nzh_CN\r\n-----\r\n[section]:#(zh_CNBEGIN)\r\n\r\n#概要\r\n\r\n大量的bug修复和一些小的功能更新。现在可以在服务端运行而不造成大的问题了。\r\n\r\n推荐的Forge版本：1.7.10-10.13.4.1517或更高\r\n\r\n依赖：[LambdaLib1.1.1](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.1.1)\r\n\r\n#更新日志\r\n\r\n##新特性\r\n\r\n*添加了版本升级检查\r\n*添加了游戏内UI位置自定义，可以从设置App打开\r\n\r\n##功能改进\r\n\r\n*大量的代码清理……\r\n*重写了一部分能力API\r\n*现在高速闪现能力在激活后可以与预设中的技能一起使用了\r\n*添加了研究笔记的熔炼合成显示\r\n*研究笔记新条目的激活现在会触发一个UI提示\r\n*把所有字体渲染替换为TrueType\r\n*添加了通过金属处理机处理虚相水晶矿的合成\r\n*让shader编译失败静默，不支持shader的机器也可以运行mod了\r\n\r\n##Bugfix\r\n\r\n*修复服务器启动时崩溃(#231)\r\n*修复了谐振水晶矿的金属合成机合成表(#238)\r\n*修复了使用能力开发机时在服务器端的崩溃(#237)\r\n*修复在LambdaLib没有安装时游戏闪退(#231)\r\n*修复风力发电机无线图标的位置(#228)\r\n*修复某些方块会在右击时同时放置方块和打开GUI(#202)\r\n*修复了和PlayerData相关的一堆崩溃(#230,#232,#239)\r\n*修复了在技能经验值为满时大脑训练课程技能熟练度不提高(#214)\r\n\r\n[section]:#(zh_CNEND)\r\n\r\n[dep]:#(LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib:1.1.1)"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364732","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364732/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364732/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0pr3","id":2364732,"tag_name":"1.0pr3","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0pr3","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":true,"created_at":"2016-01-03T13:22:00Z","published_at":"2016-01-03T13:45:56Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1172524","id":1172524,"name":"AcademyCraft-1.0pr3.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":27131504,"download_count":21,"created_at":"2016-01-03T13:35:28Z","updated_at":"2016-01-03T13:40:03Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0pr3/AcademyCraft-1.0pr3.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0pr3","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0pr3","body":"en_US\r\n-----\r\n\r\n[section]:#(en_USBEGIN)\r\n\r\nHappynewyear!\r\n\r\n#Releasenote\r\n\r\n1.0pr3madeamajorrewritetoGUIFontAPIs.NowprovidesmuchbetterlookingthroughTrueTypefonts.Notalloccurencesarereplacedthough.\r\n\r\nAlsoaddedthetutorialsystemasanexperimentalfeature.Thecontentsofthetutorialwillbepolishedinfurtherversions.\r\n\r\nNotethat1.0pr3ispossiblyNOTcompatiblewithpreviousversions'saves.Pleasebackup\r\nyourworldbeforereplacing.\r\n\r\n**WARNING**:1.0pr3isnotthouroughlytestedandispossiblyunstable.Pleasebecareful.\r\n\r\nRecommendedForgevesion:`1.7.10-10.13.4.1558`orhigher\r\nDependency:[LambdaLib1.1.0](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.1.0)\r\n\r\n#Changelog\r\n\r\n##NewFeatures\r\n*AbilityInterfererforadmins\r\n*In-modtutorialsystem(experimental)\r\n\r\n##Enhancements\r\n*ChangedallfontrenderingtoTTFrenderer,greatlyimprovedvisualquality.\r\n\r\n##Bugfixes\r\n*Fixedmissingrecipe(s)withsomeothermodsinstalled(e.g.Forestry,OpenComputers)\r\n\r\n##Misc\r\n*Lotsofrefactorsandcleanupunderthemask.Preperationforfuturestuffs:-)\r\n\r\n[section]:#(en_USEND)\r\n\r\nzh_CN\r\n-----\r\n\r\n[section]:#(zh_CNBEGIN)\r\n\r\n新年快乐！\r\n\r\n#更新概要\r\n\r\n1.0pr3对字体API进行了完全重写。通过使用TrueType字体带来更加清晰的文字效果。接下来的版本将会完全替换所有的字体渲染。\r\n\r\n同时完成了作为实验特性的教程系统。在以后的版本中我们还会持续改进和完善它。\r\n\r\n最后，你们一直要的能力干涉方块XD再也不用怕服务器里的熊孩子了\r\n\r\n注意：1.0pr3和之前的版本存档可能不兼容。请在替换mod前备份存档。\r\n\r\n**警告**：1.0pr3更改的代码量比较大，可能不是非常稳定，请在使用时多加小心。\r\n\r\n推荐的Forge版本：1.7.10-10.13.4.1558或更高\r\n\r\n依赖：[LambdaLib1.1.0](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.1.0)\r\n\r\n#更新日志\r\n\r\n##新特性\r\n*能力干涉方块（管理员用）\r\n*内置教程系统（实验性）\r\n\r\n##改进\r\n*把所有的字体渲染改用TTFRenderer，大幅提升了视觉效果。\r\n\r\n##Bug修复\r\n*修复和某些mod混合安装时出现合成表缺失的问题（e.g.林业、OpenComputers）\r\n\r\n##其他\r\n*大量的代码重构和清理，为接下来的内容更新做准备\r\n\r\n[section]:#(zh_CNEND)\r\n\r\n[dep]:#(LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib:1.1.0)"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364651","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364651/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364651/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0pr2","id":2364651,"tag_name":"1.0pr2","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0pr2","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2015-10-25T07:42:05Z","published_at":"2016-01-03T13:09:40Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1172393","id":1172393,"name":"AcademyCraft-1.0pr2.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":26186944,"download_count":3,"created_at":"2016-01-03T10:51:04Z","updated_at":"2016-01-03T11:13:57Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0pr2/AcademyCraft-1.0pr2.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0pr2","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0pr2","body":"Lang:en_US\r\n---\r\n\r\n[section]:#(en_USBEGIN)\r\n\r\n##Bugfixes\r\n\r\n*Fixed`/aimexp`commandtakingout-of-rangevalues\r\n*Fixed`/aim`commandcheats_on/offswitchbeingresetwhenplayerisdead\r\n*FixedsomeitemsnotrenderedcorrectlyinItemFrame\r\n*Fixedcan'tquitGUIwith'E'keyusingnode\r\n*Fixedwirelessmatrixinventoryflashing\r\n*FixedignoringsurroundingblockswhileplacingAbilityDeveloper\r\n*FixednotcorrectlyconsumingliquidsusingPhaseGenerator\r\n*FixedRailgunskillnotcorrectlyconsumingstackswithironblock/ingot\r\n*Fixednodename'editable'inenergyblocks'linkGUIs\r\n*Fixedperksautomaticallylearned\r\n*FixedabilitydeveloperUIopeningforALLclientswhileopeningbyONEplayer\r\n*Fixeditemscraftedwithinvalidsubtypeid(65535)\r\n*Fixedphaseliquidappearsasmissing-textureinsomesituation(MostnotablyBuildCraftTanks)\r\n*Fixedflashingwhileholdingblocksandrightclickingsomeofthemodblocks.(e.g.Nodes)\r\n*FixednameandconnectionlossofWirelessNode\r\n*FixedcanrecoverCPbylyingonthebedandleavebed\r\n*FixedslightGUIplacementerrorofMetalFormer\r\n*Fixedsomeskillscan'thurtdragonorsomeotherentities\r\n\r\n##Enhancements\r\n\r\n*NowJAVA7COMPATIBLE\r\n*Removedtheredundant'preset'command\r\n*Make'aim'command'shintsmorefriendly\r\n*Improvedja_JP.lang\r\n*Addedshift-clickbehaviorforPhaseGenerator\r\n*AdjustedapplyingrangeofArcGeneration\r\n*AddcursorforDataTerminal,improvevisualeffect\r\n*Addedlink-to-nodeUIforAbilityDeveloper,SolarGenerator,EU&RFconvertingmodules\r\n*MineRaysnowaccountsfordestroyBlocksflagandAcademyBukkitResidencesupport\r\n*Addedsomemachineworkingsounds.\r\n*ChangeImagFusortocorrectlyidentifyItemStackdamagevalue\r\n*Adjustedorespawningrate.\r\n*AddedsomeOreDictsformodmaterials\r\n*RFSupportmoduledoesn'tanymorerequireThermalExpansion\r\n\r\n##NewFeatures\r\n\r\n*MineTweaker3supportby3TUSK\r\n*Added'ResonantCrystalOre'\r\n*Addedapreviewfor'ResearchNote'\r\n\r\n[section]:#(en_USEND)\r\n\r\nLang:zh_CN\r\n---\r\n\r\n[section]:#(zh_CNBEGIN)\r\n\r\n##Bug修复\r\n\r\n*修复`/aimexp`指令接受越界的值\r\n*修复`/aim`指令的开关在玩家死亡时重置\r\n*修复一些物品不能正确在物品展示框里渲染\r\n*修复不能通过'E'键退出节点\r\n*修复无线矩阵物品栏闪烁\r\n*修复在放置能力开发机时无视（直接覆盖）周围的方块\r\n*修复使用虚相发电机时没有正确的消耗`ItemStack`\r\n*修复在使用铁锭/铁块发射超电磁炮时，物品没有被正确销毁\r\n*修复在连接到节点UI中，节点的名字\"可编辑\"\r\n*修复自动学习被动技能\r\n*修复打开能力开发机（方块）时在所有客户端打开\r\n*修复一些物品以不正确的damage-value被合成(65535)\r\n*修复虚相液体在某些情况下显示为缺失贴图（比如BuildCraft的水槽）\r\n*修复手持方块在对某些方块右键时出现闪烁\r\n*修复了节点的名字不会保存和节点的网络连接丢失\r\n*修复了躺在床上醒来也会回复CP\r\n*修复金属处理机的轻微GUI错位\r\n*修复一些技能无法伤害龙和部分其他实体\r\n\r\n##功能改进\r\n\r\n*现在兼容JAVA7了！\r\n*移除了多余的`preset`指令\r\n*让`aim`指令的提示更加友好\r\n*改进ja_JP.lang\r\n*添加虚相发电机的shift+左击动作\r\n*修改了电弧激发技能的作用距离\r\n*给数据终端添加光标，改进视觉效果\r\n*给太阳能发电机、能力开发机（方块）、EU和RF转换方块添加了主动连接界面\r\n*采矿光束现在会考虑destroyBlocks选项以及AcademyBukkit的领地支持\r\n*虚能融合机现在会正确的处理物品附加值\r\n*添加了一些机器工作的音效\r\n*调整了矿物生成率\r\n*添加了一些材料的矿物词典\r\n*RF支持模块现在不再依赖于ThermalExpansion\r\n\r\n##功能添加\r\n\r\n*MineTweaker3支持by3TUSK\r\n*添加“谐振水晶矿”\r\n*添加“研究记录”的预览\r\n\r\n[section]:#(zh_CNEND)\r\n\r\n[dep]:#(LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib:1.0)"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2315710","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2315710/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2315710/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0pr1","id":2315710,"tag_name":"1.0pr1","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0pr1","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2015-09-18T18:53:46Z","published_at":"2016-01-03T13:28:10Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1144283","id":1144283,"name":"AcademyCraft-1.0pr1.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=3","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":25437562,"download_count":45,"created_at":"2015-12-19T11:26:01Z","updated_at":"2015-12-19T11:39:30Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0pr1/AcademyCraft-1.0pr1.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0pr1","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0pr1","body":"en_US\r\n---\r\n[section]:#(en_USBEGIN)\r\n\r\nFirstprereleaseversionofAcademyCraft.Contentsincluding:\r\n\r\n*WirelessEnergySystem\r\n*AbilitySystem\r\n*DataTerminal\r\n*SkillTree\r\n*ElectroMaster\r\n*MeltDowner\r\n*Teleporter\r\n*AchievementSystem\r\n*CraftingSystem\r\n*Crossmod/pluginsupport(NEI,IC2,ThermalExpansion,Residence,ShaderMod)\r\n\r\n[section]:#(en_USEND)\r\n\r\nzh_CN\r\n---\r\n[section]:#(zh_CNBEGIN)\r\n\r\n首个预发布版本。内容包括：\r\n\r\n*无线能源系统\r\n*超能力系统\r\n*数据终端\r\n*技能树\r\n*电气使\r\n*原子崩坏\r\n*空间传送\r\n*成就系统\r\n*合成系统\r\n*跨Mod/插件支持（NEI、IC2、TE、领地、ShaderMod）\r\n\r\n[section]:#(zh_CNEND)\r\n\r\n[dep]:#(LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib:1.0)"}] bug.title: [1.0.4]服务器无法使用部分超能力
bug.body: 传送使的转移传送无法在服务器中传送 不管在什么情况下 都没办法扔出去方块 单人测试正常

bug.title: [1.0.4] 空间使坐标传送技能关闭超能力之后，重开后坐标清零

bug.body: ![025b089b c4e70c1 08-11-20-09-01](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5047602/17588506/1e3eb936-6002-11e6-80f6-88e304ca436f.png) http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/23015641/ log文件 Forge版本1614 ![bec8b072 aa11a23 08-11-19-44-02](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5047602/17587733/916d4ef0-5ffc-11e6-9fe5-0bf5d98aa1ef.png) Mod列表见上 系统配置和显卡设置没有问题

bug.title: [1.0.4] 开着矢量反射和矢量偏移的情况下打出指令/kill会使技能熟练度和经验立刻变满
[1.0.4] 金属处理机OUT槽满的情况下仍耗费能量
bug.body: 金属处理机的IN口放置的矿物处理后费掉一定电量，处理后的矿物从OUT口出来，但是OUT口满64（一组）个之后，处理机就不会再处理了，IN口的矿物数量不变，OUT口的矿石也不再增加，但是电量还是继续消耗.

bug.title: [1.0.4] 更新后服务器所新创建的世界无法使用超能力
bug.body: 1.0.3还好，只不过这只出现在新创建的世界里，使用与开发都无法进行。 原本在主世界满级的超能力者在新世界也会失去能力。 使用的Multiverse-Core-2.5多世界插件。 在1.0.4个更新中我并没有发现有新增设置可以调整这个问题，请求解答！感谢！

bug.title: [1.0.4] 部分技能不能击碎面前的方块
bug.body: 已知影响技能有 Groundshock DirBlast Meltdowner

bug.title: [1.0.4]AC的能源桥有一个小bug
bug.body: 出现在EU/IF的能源桥上，导线从发电机（目前只尝试了发电机）连接到能源桥后，导线自动延展到能源桥上，但是敲掉能源桥后导线延展出的分支并没有消退，而且之后敲掉导线再放回同一个位置延展仍然存在，上图～ ![2016-08-08_09 26 34](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17466938/062867e8-5d4b-11e6-9707-7d4d14fe8fe5.png) ![2016-08-08_09 26 45](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17466939/07129656-5d4b-11e6-9feb-d958a11d5a03.png) ![2016-08-08_09 26 49](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17466942/0737ec94-5d4b-11e6-840a-b43efd918486.png) ![2016-08-08_09 26 55](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17466941/07131e5a-5d4b-11e6-8aa4-017813aa407f.png) ![2016-08-08_09 26 58](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20895139/17466940/0713209e-5d4b-11e6-8398-8a4ce0944107.png)

bug.title: [1.0.3] 服务器中重新登入会造成能力信息重置
bug.body: 经过测试发现 使用KCauldron-1.7.10-1614.188开服 超能力始终重置 但是用cauldron-1.7.10-1.1388.1.0开服超能力就是正常的，不会重置 不过使用cauldron-1.7.10-1.1388.1.0无法启动AC1.0.2及其以上版本 From feedback@li-dev.cn 635534556@qq.com

bug.title: [1.0.3] ShiftTp skill exp will not be added when disabled block destorying
bug.body: Solution: Override getSkillExp method. Provide a new method getSkillExpRaw to get raw exp. From feedback@li-dev.cn 2303770137@qq.com

bug.title: [1.0.3] Conf file doesn't work
bug.body: Well I'm trying to modify certain things in the mod with the "academy-craft-data.conf" file on servers and I've tried doing something as simple as changing the global damage scale to 1000 and it doesn't change the damage at all. Via feedback@li-dev.cn From callumturner466@gmail.com

bug.title: [1.0.3] Context: Error when trying to send message at Server MAKEALIVE stage
[1.0.3] Crashing and unable to gain an ability
bug.body: The ability developer and the advanced ability developer have no texture, placing or attempting to use the metal former crashes the game and when I attempt to use one of three ability developers they get stuck on 0% progress when I try to gain a ability. This used to work on one alpha versions but not anymore. Here is a link to the crashlog http://pastebin.com/namTTtDU

bug.title: [1.0.3]数据终端的应用数总显示为0
[1.0.3] Vector Deviation/Reflection crash
bug.body: I would like to report something thats been happening with my game: Ever since I've updated to 1.0.3, every time I use either Reflection or Deviation, my game would suddenly hang and crash! I've repeated this many times using other abilities in the VecManip skill tree and they all work as intended except the two I've mentioned. I have other mods installed with Academycraft and at this point I'm not sure if I've installed the mod wrong or there's a conflict with the other mods. Note: I have not added any other mods after updating Academycraft and was using 1.0.1 before 1.0.3

bug.title: [1.0.3] 磁场控制服务器行为异常
bug.body: 在服务器里没法扔方块，但是消耗物品和cp，而且不增加熟练度，音效不消失

bug.title: [1.0.3] Wrong rendering with OpenGL Error 1283 (Stack Overflow)
[1.0.3]矢量反射与矢量偏移会误将经验球反射
[1.0.3] ImagLiquid + Lava = Obsidian
Some errors in the words in academy-craft.cfg
bug.body: Line 17 and 31 dictonary→dictionary

bug.title: [1.0.3] 装入服务器后，一登录服务器就被弹回了多人游戏选择服务器的界面
bug.body: 提示语为：A fatal error has occured,this connection is terminated, 服务器能开，但是一进去就被崩出去了

bug.title: [1.0.3]服务器中有些技能的特效与声音其他人不可见
bug.body: RT，比如原子崩坏的光盾，电击使的电弧激发等 1.0.2就存在了，然而1.0.3只是修复了原子崩坏的电子光束

bug.title: [1.0.3] Achievements of VecManip is missing.
[1.0.3] The opening animation does not always show when MisakaCloud has been opened once
[1.0.2] When using a certain texture pack, the developer is invisible and doesn't work. [fixed]
bug.body: hi guys i turned on the loot texter pack i my devloper is invisible

bug.title: [1.0.2]电磁牵引在受地形阻碍导致无法自然牵引成功时中止技能或过载，不增加熟练度
bug.body: 如题，我也不知道是特性还是漏洞→_→

bug.title: [1.0.2] When player using FlashTeleport, player will never get damaged.
[1.0.2] Skills can destroy paintings and item frames when the blockDestroy set 'false'.
[1.0.2] Crash when MC loading.
bug.body: 前几天游戏运行正常，现在不知为什么进不去游戏，在显示出MOJANG的logo时闪退。去掉AcademyCraft及其前置就能进入游戏，只留下AcademyCraft及其前置也无法进入游戏。没有在游戏中崩溃过。 确定在64位Java8下运行游戏，64位Windows7，正版客户端，多个存档一起玩。 目前收集到的信息： MC版本：1.7.10 bug.title: [Gradle] When generate IDEA workspace, 2 jars of LambdaLib will be linked
bug.body: One from /libs, and the other from /.m2

bug.title: [1.0.2]The number of death will be wrong while using both Vector Reflection and Plasma Cannon at the same time.
bug.body: While..something must be wrong with the update.I can't show the picture here. If a player use Vector Reflection reflect his Plasma Cannon and finally if it caused his death,there will be a lot of death information appearing.They are all like this:Player 1 is killed by Player 1 by Vector Reflection.But the final one shows that player 1 killed by Plasma Cannon. //My English is poor,I'm just loading force.

bug.title: Some errors in the words in academy-craft-data.conf.
bug.body: Line 14 and 15. maxcp_incr_rate: 0.0025 # The max cp increase rate (multiply by CP consumption) maxo_incr_rate: 0.0058 # The max overload increase rate (multiplied by Overload consumption) Multiply or Multiplied,which should be used? Line 24. # Global skill caculation interferers. caculation→calculation. And I don't know the meaning of the word "interferers".

bug.title: [1.0.2] Vector Reflection feedback loop with Thaumcraft "Spined" mobs
bug.body: Pretty simple, I punched a spined skeleton with reflection on, it hurt me with its thorns, so reflection hit it, hurting me, hitting it, hurting me, etc. Normally, it'd cause an instant overload and probably a dead skeleton, but with the fact that reflection currently makes all damage I take bypass armor (previously made issue) I ended up dying about 40 times in the span of a single game tick. I now have most deaths on our server! the skeleton seemed to have also experienced a similar fate, having dropped a stack in a half of bones, 6 bows, 2 skulls, 74 arrows, and 96 treasures (a thaumcraft drop, each "special" mob will drop one on death). I'm interested in testing this against the thorns enchant, will report back with my findings if they are of the buggy kind.

bug.title: [1.0.2] Vector Reflection doesn't work correctly with kCauldron
bug.body: Now, I'm not exactly sure what caused the issue, I believe it to be kCauldron, since it didn't appear until we added that and plugins to the server, and it persists even with the plugins gone, and since that means it is the main difference, I used deductive reasoning. Anyways, the issue I'm having is now, when Reflection is active, projectiles will reflect just fine like they used to, as will damage, but it no longer negates damage to me. In fact, while reflection is on, all damage I take bypasses my armor. This makes it far less useful in combat situations, although it _may_ be able to be considered a type of balancing, just... not the kind intended. it did negate damage before kCauldron was added. This also seems to apply to vector deviation, as well. I first encountered the issue in 1.0.1, but since I had no way of knowing what exactly caused it, I didn't want to submit it as an issue until I could pinpoint a cause, but with it persisting through the version update, I figured I'd submit it anyways.

bug.title: [1.0.2]CPData中对于Overload的处理混乱
bug.body: performWithForce与addOverload的逻辑分开，存在overload值处理不正常（pWF执行后o值为定值）和无法进入overload状态的问题 本issue包含#380 所提及的问题

bug.title: [1.0.2] Crash when learning skills
bug.body: ![qq 20160523230410](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3516419/16718758/69326912-4755-11e6-83be-ebfdd81054cb.png) 需要具体的重现条件

bug.title: Hand rendering compat with Optifine or ShadersMod
[1.0.1] Crash when MagManip is used on iron doors
bug.body: Crash report: ``` java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking entity at cn.academy.core.entity.EntityBlock$1.onEvent(EntityBlock.java:162) at cn.academy.core.entity.EntityBlock$1.onEvent(EntityBlock.java:144) at cn.lambdalib.util.entityx.EntityX.postEvent(EntityX.java:113) at cn.lambdalib.util.entityx.handlers.Rigidbody.onUpdate(Rigidbody.java:75) at cn.lambdalib.util.entityx.EntityX.update(EntityX.java:51) at cn.lambdalib.util.entityx.EntityAdvanced.func_70071_h_(EntityAdvanced.java:37) at cn.academy.core.entity.EntityBlock.func_70071_h_(EntityBlock.java:123) at cn.academy.vanilla.electromaster.MagManipEntityBlock.func_70071_h_(MagManip.scala:278) at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72866_a(World.java:2070) at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72866_a(WorldServer.java:648) at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72870_g(World.java:2034) at WorldServerOF.func_72870_g(WorldServerOF.java:347) at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:1887) at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72939_s(WorldServer.java:489) at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:636) at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:547) at net.minecraft.server.integrated.IntegratedServer.func_71217_p(IntegratedServer.java:186) at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:427) at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer$2.run(MinecraftServer.java:685) ``` I think the best solution is forbid the usage on iron doors...

bug.title: [1.0.2] Effect of ElectroBomb skill is not displayed correctly
bug.body: 来自外国友人的反馈，以下为原文 Hi, there's problem with skills, I cant see meltdowner skills like electro bomb I can see only circle. I cant see my friends skills either and they cant see mine. I can see electromaster skills only when I am electromaster. My friend can see only railgun.

bug.title: [1.0.2]原子崩坏的电子光束出现问题
bug.body: 在使用后仅出现一个圆圈，射出的特效不出现，然后会出现A Fatal Error……就如同1.0.0版本时的采矿光束和危险传送。 forge版本1558 另外在外国友人的反馈中显示他只会出现无特效，而不会出现error现象

bug.title: [建议]被禁用的技能通过其他方式提升经验值
bug.body: 有些技能被禁用后无法提升经验值，会导致后续一系列技能无法学习

bug.title: [1.0.2]被动技能经验值不增长
bug.body: 如题

bug.title: [1.0.1]磁场控制服务端失效
[1.0.2]快速按磁场控制技能键可以一次扔出两个方块
[1.0.2]矿物探测失效
[1.0.2]原子崩坏多个采集光线同时开启，关闭能力后音效不消失
[1.0.1] Vector Reflection doesn't reflect Ghast fireballs right.
bug.body: Rather simple, when trying to reflect ghast fireballs, it seems to reflect twice, resulting in it going in the same direction it was at first. That or it tries a few times and fails, not sure. The sound and visual effects trigger, but the fireball maintains it's course. On a side note, I doubt you did it intentionally, but I can't seem to reflect Thaumcraft magic, which, honestly, makes me kinda happy. Since its magic, and... Vector Reflection doesn't work well against it. Just a little bit of unintentional compat? that made me chuckle a little.

bug.title: "Unknown Error" when using certain `/aim` commands when player has no category
bug.body: This is of nothing very important, but certainly isn't expected. A good "Player has no category" hint will do.

bug.title: [1.0.1] Some abilities don't improve
bug.body: I've found this applies to more than just the Dimension Folding Theorem I submitted an issue for earlier. I've had it happen with the following abilities: β Radiation Intensify (Meltdowner category) - started off at ~22% for some reason, and stayed there, 2 seperate people on my server had the exact same issue, and nobody else had meltdowner Dimension Folding Theorem (Teleporter category) Magnet Movement (Electromaster category) - one of the people on my server had this happen, it stopped at 1.4% and didn't go up anymore, but it worked fine for me in SP so not sure what happened Vector Reflection (VecManip category) I've excluded the three shared abilities of mind course and brain course, since those aren't supposed to improve (I don't think). Not sure what is causing it, but there is one ability from each category (at least, I'm the first to reach level 4 on my server, in VecManip, the electromaster is level 3, and the two meltdowners are level 2 both, so we haven't checked every ability yet, but it does make for some rather good play testing.) Edit: Seems Railgun doesn't improve either.

bug.title: [1.0.1]矢量操作的破坏不受config文件中的设置影响
bug.body: 游戏内设置里的开关还是管用的

bug.title: [1.0.1] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/typesafe/config/ConfigMergeable
bug.body: Just got reported to me. Player was trying to use the curse launcher. when they switched back to the FTB launcher the modpack was able to launch with out problem. https://github.com/vagaprime/MageTech-Gate/issues/1 Forge 10.13.4.1614 Academcraft 1.0.1 LambdaLib 1.2.0 Reported to dev of OpenComputers as well

bug.title: [1.0.1]有关空间使的高速闪现的问题
bug.body: 1.在闪现几次后使用一次其他技能会使高速闪现累积下来的O值清空。如穿透传送。 2.开启高速闪现模式后切换预设，高速闪现仍可使用。

bug.title: [1.0.1] 定位传送：将其他玩家一同传送后在极短时间内该其他玩家会退回至原地
bug.body: 如题，具体方式可有：死亡、退出游戏。 forge1558 另附建议： 1.定位传送的标记界面中将“添加坐标”按钮变为可用（因为我见过很多人将该按钮视为添加的按钮（包括我自己）） 2.已标记的坐标在界面中名字可居中显示，靠左会使有些坐标的名字不是太清晰。 3.为坐标添加默认名字，如（1）、（2）等，以给懒人福利。

bug.title: [1.0.1] Hopper pulls from Input of Metal former
bug.body: A Hopper under a metal former will pull out the iron from the input slot that a hopper above is putting in, so automating with non-intelligent item routing methods is not very possible. I believe this is an issue with I-Sided implementations, but I'm not sure on that. I'm guessing the imag fusor will have the same issue.

bug.title: [1.0.1] Ability Induction Factor's description is mistaken
bug.body: I haven't used on before, so I might not be using it right, but I do believe you need the ability induction factor, a high voltage magnetic coil, an advanced ability developer, and to be at least level 2, right? I have all those requirements, I right click the developer with the vecmanip ability induction factor in my inventory, and the special boot screen shows up, and once it fails and tells me to use "reset" I put that in, and it says "Can't reset ability -- either level is too low or induction factor not detected." However, I clearly am level 2, and have the ability induction factor in my hotbar. I've tried it with it in my inventory, and with it in my hotbar both before the high voltage magnetic coil and after it, but no luck. [Screenshot of the developer screen with the induction factor in my hotbar](http://imgur.com/d3Ak5Tl) After grinding the threatening teleport for a whopping 3000 uses to get to level 2 so I could get vecmanip... This is a tad infuriating xD

bug.title: Typo in MisakaCloud front page
bug.body: ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9113033/16102353/265866d6-33a1-11e6-9dd9-849c3c73895a.png) Ablities -> Abilities

bug.title: [1.0.1] Shift Teleport does not seem to work
bug.body: Forge 1566 AcademyCraft 1.0.1 LambdaLib 1.2.0 Holding a block and then, pressing and holding the assigned button (default or not) shows a target marker, but does nothing on release. Tested with ore blocks, stone, cobble, sand, gravel, various AcademyCraft ores and other blocks.

bug.title: Location Teleport forgets all locations
bug.body: Forge 1566 AcademyCraft 1.0.1 LambdaLib 1.2.0 Marking locations then save and quit/disconnect (server). On reconnect, all locations are lost and must be re-visted and remarked for use in that session.

bug.title: 1.0.1启动崩溃
bug.body: [crash-2016-06-12_03.45.38-client.txt](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/files/310442/crash-2016-06-12_03.45.38-client.txt)

bug.title: 1.0.1版本崩溃，只装了forge，而且达到要求
bug.body: 安装媒体播放器后，只能播放level5那首，其他两首都读取了也只会放level5

bug.title: Media player issues
bug.body: Its not game-breaking by any means, however when the current song (E.G. Only my railgun) finishes, a player can press stop and then play, and the media player will play the next song without it's installation. (tested for Only my railgun to Judgelight, unsure about judgelight to Sister's noise. Confirmed for both creative and survival mode)

bug.body: 如题，不知道是bug还是设计就这样的.

bug.title: [1.0.1] Portable Developer - Crash
bug.body: When first booting up the portable generator, my client crashed. I am playing a LAN game. Says conflict with another mod but cannot figure out what mod that would be. http://pastebin.com/NYcQu9pm

bug.body: 在mcbbs看到玩家反应的bug..没记错的话我们有繁体中文的lang啊

bug.title: [1.0.1]Magnet Manipulation not worked
bug.body: 可對鐵磚、柵欄右鍵吸收，但是無法投擲攻擊生物甚至是對著牆扔 吸收狀態音效也會一直在耳邊環繞直到狀態時效到了才消失

bug.title: CooldownData: attempt synchronization from other client to server
Refactor custom media code
bug.body: The code is unclear in delegation and had caused lots of misunderstanding and headaches. Also it is reported that the media installation had some problems.

bug.title: [1.0.0] 在安装某些mod的情况下出现玩家数据混乱
[1.0.1]GUI text display with tChinese showing English only
bug.body: 使用繁體中文進行遊戲時 除了道具是中文以外 所有GUI顯示都是英文 如果繁中GUI尚未完成, 可否先使用簡中介面代替? When playing with language tChinese, GUI are in English except items. If tChinese GUI not ready yet, can we have sChinese GUI instead?

bug.title: energy bridge constaint drain
bug.body: even if the bridge is full and nothing is pulling power it will still take all the power it can and just delete the extra input

bug.title: [1.0.0] Metal Former mode resets to Plate Crush periodically
bug.body: I've been having this issue for a while, and can't seem to narrow down a specific cause. It seems to be something time-based, and it has even happened while processing a stack of items while I had the UI open. This didn't update the GUI, but when I closed and re-opened it, it was in plate crushing instead of etching like before. Someone on the curse page seems to have been having the same problem, so I figured I'd put this up. It isn't whenever you close and open the GUI, and it hasn't actually cut a process off partway. It's only swapped mode right after a process finishes, causing the next to not run due to the wrong mode.

bug.title: 一个可能是BUG的小问题！
bug.body: 首先，我只一个普通的玩家 然后，反馈真心麻烦 最后，重点： 我用传送使的危险传送技能攻击任何生物后有几率会 '关闭内置服务器...' 然后显示 ‘链接已丢失’ ‘Afatal error has occured, this connection is terminated’ 然后就到了游戏主菜单的多人游戏页面 Forge版本：1.7.10-Forge10.13.4.1558 然后，我只能做这么多了，我不太会找原因，所以对不起我没帮上什么忙，可能还帮了倒忙 我的MCBBS ID：荒城孤岛 QQ：2971131798

bug.title: [1.0.0] Teleporter Critical Hit kicking user from server
bug.body: I recently managed to get an ability developer on my small server (might have taken so long because I went straight to advanced), and I got teleporter. Everytime I use the Threatening Teleport to damage an enemy and it crits, I get kicked from the server. I'll have to wait a while to get a server-side log (friend is hosting and away at work atm) but it does seem to be 100% consistent and 100% annoying. I don't care for getting disconnected every 5 seconds when I use my ability on our already laggy server. as if PvE wasn't hard enough at 5 tps, constant relogging definitely doesn't help. I have noticed that the ability that used to give higher chance for crits, as well as the one that gives higher damage crits, haven't been gaining any experience, and I'm not sure if its due to this or due to them not auto-unlocking anymore (haven't tested teleporter yet in the new version).

bug.title: [1.0.0] Metal Former mode change buttons both cycle the same way.
bug.body: Having an arrow that points left, and one that points right, I figured that one would cycle one way, and the other would cycle the other. I'm not sure if its just a bug that it's not working for me or if it wasn't thought of, but I definitely think it should do that. overshooting the mode by one and then clicking the other arrow only to advance farther away is somewhat bothersome. It's not a huge issue, but it would be a nice quality of life improvement. I'm trying to figure out why the mode isn't exactly staying put between some uses of it, but I'll be doing further testing of that to see if I can narrow down a culprit before posting that issue.

bug.title: [1.0.0] Block-removing problem while teleporting

bug.title: [1.0.0] Some GUI Container's window size don't match actual size
bug.body: This will cause some item stack to be thrown out of window even if in the gui area.

bug.title: [1.0.0] Basic Mining Ray crash
bug.body: So when you use the basic mining ray it will crash when you keep using it until you run out of power. Or if you stop before you run out of power it will boot you back to the main menu. Still happened when tested with just mod by itself.

bug.title: [1.0.0] Rejoining Bug
bug.body: "After rejoin in wirld items in machines will be deleted and all wireless systems will be reset." (после перезахода в мир предметы в машинах будут удалены, а также все беспроводные системы будут разорваны) - by юра никольский nikolanski@mail.ru After rejoining a world, items and wireless data will be reset.

bug.title: [1.0.0] Metal former mode doesn't change with Wawla
bug.body: I can't seem to get the metal former to change modes now. It's perpetually in Plate Crushing. I click the arrows next to the mode, and it will change it to the symbol for refining mode, and when I mouse over the mode it will pop "refining" up for a split second before changing the popup to "plate crushing." it won't flash the "refining" popup again until i click the arrow again, at which point nothing seems to change, except it will occasionally make it so the popup will flash once when you hover over the symbol again. it still works like its in plate crushing mode, and will make constraint metal ingots into plates. Rarely, when clicking the arrows in quick succession, the symbol will change to what I can only guess to be etching, and it will only popup the "plate crushing" text. It also still works as if it is in that mode. If I close and re-open the interface, no matter what mode the symbol says it should be in, it resets to the plate crushing mode and picture. I've tried breaking and replacing it, moving it close and farther from the node, as well as simply out of the space it was in, in case there was residual data in that space from when I loaded the world without AcademyCraft so I could actually continue using the world (I just spawned everything I had back in) in the new version. I have no idea what is causing it, but is does make things more difficult.

bug.title: [1.0.0] MisakaCloud Terminal and Wind Generator UI
bug.body: If you right click a Wind Generator base whilst holding a MisakaCloud Terminal, the Terminal will open up, and as soon as you close it, the Generator will open up after. I haven't tested with any other generators, but the matrix and nodes don't do this. They simply open their UI instead. It seems that the wind generator base has a special opening method, since often you'll get a quick glimpse of the block you hold placing before it opens and realizes it didn't actually place it. I'm guessing that has something to do with it.

bug.title: [latest] Weird cooldown
bug.body: Currently, cooldown has several strange issues. - Sometimes when cooldown's time goes down to 0, the skill still can't be used after some time. - Changing category while having cd renders some certain skills unusable. - When used in server, cooldown is shared among players.

bug.title: [latest version]Problem with Magnet Manipulation's damage system
bug.body: Magnet Manip could cause damage to skill performer. If the performer dies out of Magnet Manip, minecraft will crash.

bug.title: [1.0pr3_1]Guis glitch out textures.
bug.body: Whenever I try to look up a recipe for one of your items, and it involves one of your machines, or if I right click and open up the gui of any of your machines, my textures glitch it out, making everything illegible and making it impossible for me to use your mod. Before and after "installing" the gui. ![2016-04-25_16 44 39](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/13999739/14801325/b12c7ffa-0b05-11e6-9c9e-0439eb2d8d32.png) ![2016-04-25_16 46 50](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/13999739/14801342/cdd5e394-0b05-11e6-887e-6160b2ffd2dc.png) I am using AcademyCraft 1.0pr3_1 and Lambda Lib 1.1.1. bug.title: [1.0pr3_1] [严重]发现一个利用机器可刷任何物品的BUG
bug.body: 上次我服务器里那个发现抛硬币BUG的玩家已经升为管理了，这次我和他发现了个更为严重的BUG，如题 由于这个BUG的严重性，应该还没人发现，所以我不方便细说 利用虚能融合机，金属处理机，甚至风力的主机，只要能放东西进去的都行， 服务器和单机经测试都可以刷，大致就是经过几个步骤复制一个你放进去的物品，无论放多少一次只能复制一个 考虑了很久要不要公开BUG，毕竟不是刷硬币那么简单 请问一下如何在不公开的情况下提交

bug.body: 游戏版本1.7.10 Forge版本10.13.4.1614 放置无线矩阵后，只要打开GUI后把鼠标移到右上方游戏就会闪退

bug.title: Context: MakeAlive doesn't affect surround clients when created in client
bug.body: in current dev branch.

bug.title: Data Terminal Keybinding changes don't save if done on a server
bug.body: My friends and I have been using a server for a while now, and we've found that if we change the bindings on there, they stay until we relog, at which point, it resets, not necessarily to default, but to whatever they were before the change, i.e. changing them on single player works, but then changing them again on the server will last until you relog, and then they will revert to what you set it to in singleplayer. I'm guessing its because the keybinds are in the config file itself, and on the server it tries to save it to the wrong one, i.e. the server one, but that doesn't explain why it still works up until you relog... Definitely been a consistent issue though. We're having powers cut out oddly, but have yet to determine enough a pattern for a bug report yet.

bug.title: Metal Former resets mode on chunk reload
bug.body: Rather simple, if you set the metal former to be in say, etching mode, then reload the chunk by either go far enough away or relogging, it goes back to plate crush mode. Kinda annoying cause I want to automate etching data chips with AE but that makes it impossible. also happens with incising and refining modes.

bug.title: Skill CD Problem
bug.body: In vecmanip branch: 1.Thunderclap skill has about 20mins' cd 2.If player log out then log in, all skills will refreshed

bug.body: Horse: Data Menu not working; Ability Menu not working Minecart: Ability Menu not working Boat: Ability Menu not working

bug.title: [1.0pr3_1] Rail Gun & Magnetic Manipulation
bug.body: Two issues running on this version. The Rail Gun ability does not work or trigger. You have the coins in your inventory and when click the hotkey assigned to it, nothing happens. I have tried assigning multiple hotkeys just to test if it was the hotkey assignment and still same result. Magnetic Manipulation - Does not allow you to throw blocks. The only thing you can do with it is when you have a conductive block in your hand you can use the ability to increase movement speed and then when you stop casting it consumes the block. I am not sure if this was the intention or not.

bug.title: Machine frame block is always set as HarvestLevel "pickaxe" and 3
[1.0pr3_1] Can't find FieldUtils.getAllFieldsList in ApacheCommons
bug.body: http://pastebin.com/Gnc7LiRG

bug.title: ConcurrentModification while iterating in ClientRuntime#keyStates
bug.body: ``` java.util.ConcurrentModificationException at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextNode(HashMap.java:1429) at java.util.HashMap$EntryIterator.next(HashMap.java:1463) at java.util.HashMap$EntryIterator.next(HashMap.java:1461) at cn.academy.ability.api.context.ClientRuntime$Events.onClientTick(ClientRuntime.java:311) ``` This happens because we call the `onKeyDown` inside the loop, which delegates to `ClientRuntime#addKey` and modifies the map. I think the add method's modification process shall be deferred to ticking loop.

bug.title: Apps don't available when install them with terminal on
bug.body: When I tried to install some apps into the terminal with it on, apps couldn't be found in present terminal screen. After reopened the screen, they were finally available.

bug.title: 频率变送器的退出有逻辑错误
bug.body: 打开频率变送器后，直接右击普通方块退出，要按两下Alt才能再打开数据终端

bug.title: [1.0pr3_1]Crystal Ores don't support Fortune Enchantment
[1.0pr3_1]Energy Bridge Bugs
bug.body: Author: 橘子商城一级棒 http://tieba.baidu.com/p/4235738678

bug.title: [1.0pr3_1]有关巡航光束炮的两个BUG
bug.body: 1.在开启后若击杀了一个生物，便会停止技能，不再继续。 2.当CP不足以释放巡航光束炮的第一次攻击时，会在玩家周围创造一个不消失的光球（重新进入存档后消失）

bug.title: Incompatibility with Data Terminal when also using CosmeticArmorReworked mod
bug.body: SAOUI Version: saoui-1.7.10-1.4.a - http://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/sao-ui/issues/16 AcademyCraft-1.0pr3_1 I have mentioned this to the SAO UI team as well. With these two mods being used together, the Data Terminal GUI will not display, but does work (if you click in the right places, you can access other GUIs).

bug.title: [1.0pr3_1] Update notifier
bug.body: Since updating to 1.0pr3_1 I keep receiving a notification each time I load I start up the game that there is a new version available for download, and the new version is the one that I am running.

bug.title: [1.0pr3_1]coin will double after using it if you change into another item
bug.body: 将硬币掷出后切换到其他物品，会获得两个硬币。 并且经由此途径刷出的硬币无法与原硬币堆叠

bug.title: Check Ability abort/end callback's consistency
KeyHint UI disappears after changing dimension
发现一个无限刷硬币的BUG。Unlimited access to Coin of BUG
bug.body: 1.首先准备两组的硬币，装备在快捷栏中 2.第一组若干硬币，第二组64个满硬币 2.抛起第一组的一个硬币，在硬币落下之前滚轮切换到第二组 然后就谜一样的在物品栏获得了2个硬币。重复步骤可无限获得 发现BUG的版本： LambdaLib-1.1.0 AcademyCraft-1.0pr3 Minecraft-1.7.10-Forge10.13.4.1558 Java8_u66 我服务器的一个玩家无聊抛硬币发现的，不清楚有没有人提交这个BUG

bug.title: 为什么网络名总是unnamed
bug.body: 我设好了名字，连接正常，所有设备都能用了，就是连接名变成了这个默认的，是我弄的不对，还是BUG，如果是BUG的话，希望下版能解决，谢谢

bug.title: [1.0pr3] Metal Former recipe of resoCrystal is in-out reversed

bug.body: Noticed this issue in my fml client console when I'm near an advanced ability developer: http://pastebin.com/j9XbdWjv. Removing the developer stops it from spamming the console.

bug.title: Potential crash while waking up
bug.body: ![](http://i4.tietuku.com/38f823fa5ac5ffa2.jpg)

bug.title: RF Support problem with Current Charging
bug.body: In a creative mode single player world, I used /aim to give myself level 5 and set the mastery level of Current Charging to 100%. Then, I set up a Capacitor Bank from Ender IO next to an Energy Bridge (CoFH Out) from Academycraft. When I used Current Charging on the Capacitor Bank directly, it charged at 7 RF/t. When I used Current Charging on the Energy Bridge, the Capacitor Bank charged at 120 RF/t. 7 RF/t seems very low. I'd expect the two numbers to both be 120 RF/t. Is this a bug, or intended?

bug.title: Electromaster Current Charging works with empty CP
bug.body: An Electromaster can use their Current Charging ability even when they're out of CP.

bug.title: Overload bypass
bug.body: I'm a Level 5 Teleporter. I haven't tried this with the other two ability types, but I'd assume this bug is universal. If I spam some of my abilities fast enough back-to-back (Penetrate Teleport and Mark Teleport, for example) I can go past my maximum overload and still be able to use my abilities. Pretty much all my abilities seem to function correctly after going past maximum overload except Flashing. As soon as I use Flashing, the game realizes I'm above my maximum overload and prevents me from using my abilities until the Overload goes down to 0 again. In short, going past your maximum Overload allows you to effectively ignore Overload altogether (though you do have to be careful to not go back under your maximum, or the glitch ends).

bug.title: Brain Course series not improving
bug.body: I'm a Teleporter. My maximum CP is currently 21500 (9,500.0+12000.0) and my maximum Overload is 1,100 (600.0+500.0). My skills are currently at 100% on everything, except for Brain Course Advanced, which is stuck at 36.1%, and Mind Course, which is stuck at 0.0%. No matter which skill I use, they won't improve. It seems the completion level for Brain Course Advanced and Mind Course don't go up when you use skills you've already 100%ed. I'd assume the same bug effects Brain Course, too, though I already 100%ed it before hitting this bug, so I can't be sure.

bug.title: 多人游戏中能力开发机导致客户端卡死
bug.body: 在多人游戏里一放开发机，客户端就开始卡顿，过一会客户端就占用满内存然后卡死，不过服务端没问题。 错误信息： ``` java.lang.NullPointerException at cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLOutboundHandler$OutboundTarget$7.selectNetworks(FMLOutboundHandler.java:193) ~[FMLOutboundHandler$OutboundTarget$7.class:?] at cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLOutboundHandler.write(FMLOutboundHandler.java:273) ~[FMLOutboundHandler.class:?] at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.invokeWrite(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:644) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?] at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.write(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:698) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?] at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.write(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:637) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?] at io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder.write(MessageToMessageEncoder.java:115) ~[MessageToMessageEncoder.class:?] at io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageCodec.write(MessageToMessageCodec.java:116) ~[MessageToMessageCodec.class:?] at bug.title: [1.0pr2] Can place the block while opening the block GUI for some blocks
bug.body: 比如说太阳能和能源桥

bug.title: Data Chip Crafting issue.
bug.body: So the title says most of the part however I'll attempt to provide more information So first i can't check the recipe in NEI. When pressing R on Data Chip nothing happens. Second, I found an crafting file telling how to craft the chip but would not appear in the finished crafting box. Also same thing goes for Empty unit. Forge version: 1541 [Edited, forgot to put it in...] Here's the log you asked for: http://bit.ly/1NMyrm1 NOTE: I could not use pastebin. Why? Well after pasting in the text the website keep's freezing for me.

bug.title: 能源桥在局域网联机时GUI总是显示在主机上
bug.body: 版本1.0pr2

bug.title: RF in block doesn't output RF properly
Issue with RF IN block.
bug.body: At least that is what I'm assuming this is. I'm going to both copy the crash report onto a pastebin and give you the direct copy of the .txt file generated. What happened was I accidentally clicked on the rf in block which is below one of my many ae2 crafting terminals, and then tried to open my ae2 network, but instead of reaching for the ae2 console string, it tried to open a gui for the rf in block, which doesnt exist, and in turn crashed the server. I will attempt to somehow fix this on my end for now, probably by removing the block and placing it somewhere else after extending the fluxducts I had connected to it before. But I felt you should know of this issue as well, so that it can be dealt with on your end as well. We both know that block doesn't have or need a gui. So I'm sure you're just as lost as I am about why it's trying to open one for it. pastebin: http://pastebin.com/4YXUgcLV Dropbox: https://www.dropbox.com/s/m0otw7au1f4lk27/crash-2015-10-28_08.30.33-server.txt
