bug.title: Render out of bound
bug.body: ![qq 20150801162119](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5047602/9021218/74536dec-3869-11e5-9529-e8edac126fdb.jpg) ![qq 20150801162127](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5047602/9021219/74588200-3869-11e5-99fe-543da531fcda.jpg) Using Freq Transmitter

bug.title: SyncAction duplication at player client opening the SyncAction in Client/Server env
bug.body: When in standard client/server layout, when I start an SyncAction at client side, another duplication of it is spawned at client side too. That dummy duplication receives onStart() callback, but nothing else. So when player ends using the ability a dangling SyncAction is left behind. You can use the CurrentCharging skill in Electro Master to test. I have left the debug print in case you use them.

bug.title: Explicit hint for saving node's name
bug.body: Currently there is no way to inform the player that the node's name is edited and needs to be saved. There should be a button or so to do it, also we should auto-save the name when gui closes.

bug.title: A problem about coin in the survival mode
bug.body: 在生存模式下，如果硬币所在的位置不在第一格且第一格有物品的情况下，那么扔出去硬币在收回来的时候，会变成第一格的物品_(:з」∠)_

bug.title: Update build.gradle
bug.body: マジ古いビルドファイル！！！

bug.title: Title changed to English when transiting PresetEdit UI
Make KeyEdit UI regconize Mouse events
Reload configurations after config has been changed
Ensure safety issue of NetworkCall casting
Automatic inventory drop for ACBlockContainer
Broken SyncAction
bug.body: - End or Abort callback executed only in SERVER Side - Ends right away after start, but in VERY rare conditions runs well - Maybe you can debug using SyncActionInstant.

bug.title: ItemStack is out of sync for WindGenMain and cause misjudgement in rendering
Render bounding box for all BLockMultis
SyncAction should not be run if its not started
player field is null for SyncAction in readNBTStart
bug.body: We need associated information to init the action (such as fetching entities), so knowing the player in advance would be necessary.

bug.title: Node energy overflow
Change latency to bandwith or transfer rate
bug.body: That is a serious phrase misuse...

bug.title: Fix @Side issues
bug.body: Orz

bug.title: Global timer
bug.body: Currently we use Minecraft.getSystemTime() in many place (especially rendering) to achieve better effect. But that timer runs regardless of screen pause, so if user pauses the screen the effect will still be running. Create a global timer that takes account of this.

bug.title: Develope ability doesn't consume exp
Activing railgun can't consume coin
Wrong dropping matrix
bug.body: If a matrix has been overlaped to another one, first one will drop and another one will be removed.

bug.title: Can't do mouse click action when clear ability data
bug.body: Maybe this action didn't move the ac_void item from player.

bug.title: Can't do mouse click action after disabling ability
bug.body: It happened with create mode.

bug.body: With log: at cn.liutils.template.block.BlockDirectionalMulti$SubBlockPos.destroyMe(BlockDirectionalMulti.java:309) ~[BlockDirectionalMulti$SubBlockPos.class:?]

bug.body: Fix it quikly if possible.

bug.body: Ah, so we have to check this again???

bug.title: Not Support to old graphic cards
bug.body: On the platform with old graphic cards, GUIs' drawing become wrong. The problem will only be at big GUIs. Test Platform: Graphic Card: GeForce G 105M Driver Ver: 332.44

bug.title: Clear WirelessSystem when world resets
Ignore skill event when client opens GUI
bug.body: Server detects unexpected RAW_DOWN event when GUI is opened. Maybe related to #24.

bug.title: Updata State when player enters a dimension
Save AbilityData for all players on client
Ability control when player is dead
bug.body: - Save AbilityData - Reset ctrl - Stop state Related to #16, #17.

bug.title: Implement Pattern for Skills
bug.body: Related to #18.

bug.title: Dangling SkillStates
bug.body: In many cases, `SkillState`(generated by `Patterns`) will not normally end. For example, when I press M0 and press M1, and then release M0, the skill activated by M0 is still executing. This is a really serious gameplay issue, better fix it quickly...

bug.title: In client playing, player ability data is not stored when player is dead.
bug.body: When I use /aset xxx, and suddenly suicide, everything is restored to the original state. Maybe we should not only save when world is loaded/unloaded, but on some specific event as well?

bug.title: maxCP decreased wrongly while calling decreaseCP()
bug.body: see SkillArcGen. When using the standard decreaseCP procedure in server, maxCP also decreases.

bug.title: Ability enable switch (V key) not working
Player has moved wrongly while staying in AbilityDeveloper
bug.body: I think it's probably because of too long time making the player on the air. But I believe we can go through this limit by riddenEntity or something, but not quite sure. Anyone know how to do this in the most simple way?
